original: 'brel ba can dag phan tshun ltos pa'i dbang las rnam par brtags pa 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: 'brel ba can dag phan tshun ltos pa'i dbang las rnam par brtags pa 'ba' zhig go //
translated: They are merely imagined in dependence on the mutual dependence of the related things.

original: gang brtags pa de ni 'ga' zhig tu yang don bya ba la sbyor ba ma yin zhing don bya ba'i don can ni rtogs pa ldan ba rnams kyi rtsom pa thams cad do zhes pas 'brel ba rjes su dpag bar 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang brtags pa de ni 'ga' zhig tu yang don bya ba la sbyor ba ma yin zhing don bya ba'i don can ni rtogs pa ldan ba rnams kyi rtsom pa thams cad do zhes pas 'brel ba rjes su dpag bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is imagined is never applied to the performance of a function. And the purpose of a function is the whole endeavor of those who are endowed with understanding. Therefore, the relation is not fit to be imagined.

original: gang brtags pa de ni rjes su dpag par 'os pa ma yin te /üîΩrjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i 'brel pa bzhin sgra dang don gyi 'brel ba yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang brtags pa de ni rjes su dpag par 'os pa ma yin te / rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i 'brel pa bzhin sgra dang don gyi 'brel ba yang de lta bu'o //
translated: That which is imagined is not fit to be inferred.üîΩThe relation of word and meaning is like the relation of inference and the object inferred.

original: khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The relation of word and meaning is like the relation of inference and the object inferred.

original: 'o na spyi brtags pa yin na /üîΩyang na rjes su dpag par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na spyi brtags pa yin na / yang na rjes su dpag par bya'o zhe na /
translated: If the universal is imagined,üîΩthen it must be inferred.

original: de la rang gi mtshan nyid kho na gzhan gyi ngo bos rjes su dpag bar bya ba'o zhes pa 'di bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la rang gi mtshan nyid kho na gzhan gyi ngo bos rjes su dpag bar bya ba'o zhes pa 'di bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained that only the particular is to be inferred by means of the universal.

original: ci ste nye bar 'jal ba la sogs pa lhag ma ci ltar zhes pa sogs pa'i sgras ni zhes grags ba nyid du srid pa la sogs ba gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci ste nye bar 'jal ba la sogs pa lhag ma ci ltar zhes pa sogs pa'i sgras ni zhes grags ba nyid du srid pa la sogs ba gzung bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut how about the rest, such as comparison?‚Äù The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes such things as testimony.

original: phyogs 'di lhag ma bshad pa yin zhes pa ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs 'di kho nas nye bar 'jal ba la sogs pa rnams ji ltar srid pa bzhin du tshad ma yin pa nyid dang / tshad ma gzhan ma yin @292b pa nyid du bshad par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs 'di lhag ma bshad pa yin zhes pa ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs 'di kho nas nye bar 'jal ba la sogs pa rnams ji ltar srid pa bzhin du tshad ma yin pa nyid dang / tshad ma gzhan ma yin @292b pa nyid du bshad par rig par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis remaining position is explained‚Äù means that just by this very position that has been explained, it should be understood that comparison and so on are valid cognitions in accordance with how they are possible and that they are not other valid cognitions.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs de nye bar 'jal ba'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs de nye bar 'jal ba'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: The remaining position that has been explained is stated from the perspective of comparison.

original: re zhig nye bar 'jal ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: re zhig nye bar 'jal ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFirst, comparison‚Äù and so on.

original: ba lang dang ba men la sogs pa rnams la zhes pas lung ston to //
analyzed: ba lang dang ba men la sogs pa rnams la zhes pas lung ston to //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch as cows and oxen‚Äù teaches the scripture.

original: 'dra bar rtogs pa'i don can zhes ba 'dra bar nges pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dra bar rtogs pa'i don can zhes ba 'dra bar nges pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the meaning of realizing similarity‚Äù means ‚Äúhaving the reason of ascertaining similarity.‚Äù

original: rab tu grub pa dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed ba ni nye bar 'jal ba'o zhes pa 'di de'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rab tu grub pa dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed ba ni nye bar 'jal ba'o zhes pa 'di de'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Analogy is the proof of the probandum through similarity to a well-established fact. This is its definition.

original: rab tu grub pa ni tshad las nges pa ba lang la sogs pa yin zhing /
analyzed: rab tu grub pa ni tshad las nges pa ba lang la sogs pa yin zhing /
translated: A well-established fact is a cow and so on that is ascertained from a valid means of knowledge.

original: de dang chos mthun pa nyid de chos mtshungs pa nyid ni rab tu grub pa dang chos mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dang chos mthun pa nyid de chos mtshungs pa nyid ni rab tu grub pa dang chos mthun pa nyid do //
translated: Similarity to that, sameness of attributes, is similarity to a well-established fact.

original: de las ba lang la sogs pa la ltos pas ba men la sogs pa 'dra ba nyid sgrub bar byed cing 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'jal ba'o //
analyzed: de las ba lang la sogs pa la ltos pas ba men la sogs pa 'dra ba nyid sgrub bar byed cing 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'jal ba'o //
translated: From that, in dependence on a cow and so on, the proof and establishment of the similarity of a gayal and so on is analogy.

original: de la gzhan las thos nas zhes pa /
analyzed: de la gzhan las thos nas zhes pa /
translated: Regarding that, having heard from another...

original: ba lang lta bu ni ba men no zhes pa la sogs pa yid ches pa'i tshig thos pa sngon ma can /
analyzed: ba lang lta bu ni ba men no zhes pa la sogs pa yid ches pa'i tshig thos pa sngon ma can /
translated: Having previously heard the words of a reliable person, such as A gayal is like a cow,

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i rten gyi ba men la sogs pa 'dra ba nyid rtogs pa gang de ni sgra las byung ba kho na ste /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i rten gyi ba men la sogs pa 'dra ba nyid rtogs pa gang de ni sgra las byung ba kho na ste /
translated: the understanding of the similarity of the gayal and so on, which is the basis of what is to be expressed, is only derived from words.

original: sgra las rab tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: sgra las rab tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: It is inference because it is derived from sound.

original: sgra las byung ba yang rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'dus ba nyid kyi phyir tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba yang rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'dus ba nyid kyi phyir tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Since that which is derived from sound is included within inference, it is not a separate valid knowledge.

original: phyi rol gyi don la ni slu ba nyid kyi phyir na de tshad ma nyid kho na med do zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la ni slu ba nyid kyi phyir na de tshad ma nyid kho na med do zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intended meaning is that external objects are not valid knowledge because they are deceptive.

original: rang nyid kyis yin na ni don gnyis zhes pa /
analyzed: rang nyid kyis yin na ni don gnyis zhes pa /
translated: If it were itself, then there would be two objects.

original: rang nyid kho nas ba lang dang ba men gnyis mngon sum gyis rtogs nas /üîΩyid kyis 'dra ba nyid du gang gi tshe 'di dag rtogs pa de'i tshe nyams su myong zin ba'i don gyi yul can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rang nyid kho nas ba lang dang ba men gnyis mngon sum gyis rtogs nas / yid kyis 'dra ba nyid du gang gi tshe 'di dag rtogs pa de'i tshe nyams su myong zin ba'i don gyi yul can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: If it were itself, then having directly understood both a cow and a gavaya,

original: rtogs pa de dran pa la sogs pa bzhin du tshad ma kho nar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: rtogs pa de dran pa la sogs pa bzhin du tshad ma kho nar mi 'gyur na /
translated: when the mind understands their similarity, then that understanding would not be valid knowledge, like remembering a previously experienced object, because it has an object that has already been experienced.

original: ci zhig las tshad ma gzhan du 'gyur //
analyzed: ci zhig las tshad ma gzhan du 'gyur //
translated: If it is not valid knowledge, then how could it be a different type of valid knowledge?

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ba lang dang ma he mngon sum gyis mthong nas gang gi tshe 'di las 'di mi 'dra ba'o zhes pa de dag mi 'dra bar rtogs pa de'i de yang tshad ma gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ba lang dang ma he mngon sum gyis mthong nas gang gi tshe 'di las 'di mi 'dra ba'o zhes pa de dag mi 'dra bar rtogs pa de'i de yang tshad ma gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: de ltar rtogs pa na ma yin zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa na ma yin zhes pa /
translated: When one understands in that way, it is not so.

original: tshad ma yin pas rtogs bzhin pa ni /
analyzed: tshad ma yin pas rtogs bzhin pa ni /
translated: Since it is valid cognition, what is being understood

original: dran ba la sogs pas rtogs pa ltar 'dra ba nyid ni gzhal bya ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dran ba la sogs pas rtogs pa ltar 'dra ba nyid ni gzhal bya ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: is not an object of comprehension that is similar to what is understood by memory and so on. This is the meaning.

original: phyogs can len gyis @293a * //üîΩsmras pa / lung gis byas pa'i 'du byed las dran ba la ltos pa'i chos mthun pa nyid shes pa las mtshungs pa nyid ces bya ba'i 'brel ba rtogs pa ni nye bar 'jal ba'i don to zhes so //
analyzed: phyogs can len gyis @293a * // smras pa / lung gis byas pa'i 'du byed las dran ba la ltos pa'i chos mthun pa nyid shes pa las mtshungs pa nyid ces bya ba'i 'brel ba rtogs pa ni nye bar 'jal ba'i don to zhes so //
translated: BhƒÅviveka‚Äôs responseüîΩBhƒÅviveka says, ‚ÄúThe meaning of upamƒÅna is the understanding of the relation called samƒÅnƒÅdhikara·πáa, the knowledge of similarity that depends on memory, which is produced by testimony.‚Äù

original: ba lang lta bu ba men no zhes pa'i lung 'dis byas pa'i 'du byed gang yin pa dran pa'i shes pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: ba lang lta bu ba men no zhes pa'i lung 'dis byas pa'i 'du byed gang yin pa dran pa'i shes pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: The testimony, ‚ÄúA buffalo is like a cow,‚Äù produces a mental factor that is the cause of the knowledge of memory.

original: de las dran pa gang yin pa de la ltos pa'i chos mthun pa nyid shes pa las /
analyzed: de las dran pa gang yin pa de la ltos pa'i chos mthun pa nyid shes pa las /
translated: From that, one understands the similarity of the object in relation to the memory.

original: gang mtshungs ba zhes bya ba'i 'brel ba rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang mtshungs ba zhes bya ba'i 'brel ba rtogs pa ste /
translated: From that, one understands the relation called similarity.

original: ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa yongs su gcod pa de nye bar 'jal ba'i yul lo //
analyzed: ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa yongs su gcod pa de nye bar 'jal ba'i yul lo //
translated: The ascertainment of the relation between the name and the bearer of the name is the object of inference.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: dang por re zhig ba lang lta bur ba men no zhes sgras yongs su gcod cing /
analyzed: dang por re zhig ba lang lta bur ba men no zhes sgras yongs su gcod cing /
translated: First, by the word ‚Äúox,‚Äù one ascertains a gayal as an ox.üîΩFrom that, one sees that the gayal is similar to an ox in relation to memory, and one understands that it is an ox.

original: de las ba men mthong ba dran pa la ltos pa'i chos mthun pa nyid shes pa kho na las 'di ltar 'di ba men no zhes zhen par byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las ba men mthong ba dran pa la ltos pa'i chos mthun pa nyid shes pa kho na las 'di ltar 'di ba men no zhes zhen par byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: This is the ascertainment.

original: 'di yang gal te ji ltar lung las yongs su gcad pa de ltar ma mthong ba yang yongs su gcod par byed na ni /
analyzed: 'di yang gal te ji ltar lung las yongs su gcad pa de ltar ma mthong ba yang yongs su gcod par byed na ni /
translated: If one ascertains what one has not seen in the way that it is ascertained from scripture,

original: des na dran pa kho na ste tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: des na dran pa kho na ste tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: then memory alone would be a valid means of knowledge.

original: ci ste 'di'i zhes khyad par ngo shes pa las khyad par du rtogs par byed na de'i phyir rjes su dpag ba kho na ste tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste 'di'i zhes khyad par ngo shes pa las khyad par du rtogs par byed na de'i phyir rjes su dpag ba kho na ste tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
translated: But if one understands the difference by recognizing the difference in this, then it is only inference, not another valid cognition.

original: de ltar ni gang ba lang dang mtshungs pa de ba men no zhes rnam par gzhag ba na /
analyzed: de ltar ni gang ba lang dang mtshungs pa de ba men no zhes rnam par gzhag ba na /
translated: For example, when one posits that a gayal is similar to a cow,

original: 'dra ba'i rtags las khyad par rtogs pas so //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i rtags las khyad par rtogs pas so //
translated: one understands the difference by the reason of similarity.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: mthong bzhin pa'i gong bu ni chos can no //
analyzed: mthong bzhin pa'i gong bu ni chos can no //
translated: The object that is being seen is the subject.

original: 'di ba men no zhes pa'i ming ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos so //
analyzed: 'di ba men no zhes pa'i ming ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos so //
translated: The name ‚ÄúThis is a gayal‚Äù is the property to be proven.

original: sgra nyams su myong ba las mdun na gnas pa dag la gang ba lang dang ba men 'dra ba'i spyi de ni phyogs kyi chos so //
analyzed: sgra nyams su myong ba las mdun na gnas pa dag la gang ba lang dang ba men 'dra ba'i spyi de ni phyogs kyi chos so //
translated: The universal that is similar to a cow and a gayal in front, which is experienced from the sound, is the property of the subject.

original: lung nyams su myong ba'i blo la gnas pa'i ba men ni dpe'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: lung nyams su myong ba'i blo la gnas pa'i ba men ni dpe'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The gayal that exists in the mind that experiences the scripture is the example.

original: thabs mtha' yas pa can yang mtshungs so zhes bya ba 'brel ba rtogs pa'o zhes pas /
analyzed: thabs mtha' yas pa can yang mtshungs so zhes bya ba 'brel ba rtogs pa'o zhes pas /
translated: It is the same even with regard to the infinite means. This is the understanding of the relation.

original: nye bar 'jal ba kho na la ngor dga' ba ci zhig yin /
analyzed: nye bar 'jal ba kho na la ngor dga' ba ci zhig yin /
translated: What is the point of being pleased with mere analogy?

original: dper na gang sna mtho ba de nag pa ste gang rta la zhon pa de byams pa'o zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gang sna mtho ba de nag pa ste gang rta la zhon pa de byams pa'o zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúWhoever has a high nose is dark, and whoever rides a horse is friendly.‚Äù

original: 'di tshad ma yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di tshad ma yang ma yin no //
translated: This is not a valid cognition.

original: ri khrod pas na smras pa /üîΩnye bar 'jal ba yang 'dra ba nyid du /
analyzed: ri khrod pas na smras pa / nye bar 'jal ba yang 'dra ba nyid du /
translated: The forest hermit says:

original: nye bar ma grub ba'i don la blo skye ba ste /
analyzed: nye bar ma grub ba'i don la blo skye ba ste /
translated: Analogy is also a cognition that arises in regard to an object that is not established as similar.

original: dper na ba men mthong pa ba lang dran pa'i zhes so //
analyzed: dper na ba men mthong pa ba lang dran pa'i zhes so //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúHaving seen a cow, one remembers a gayal.‚Äù

original: de yang bzung zin pa'i yul can nyid kyi phyir dran pa la sogs @293b ba bzhin du tshad ma nyid du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de yang bzung zin pa'i yul can nyid kyi phyir dran pa la sogs @293b ba bzhin du tshad ma nyid du mi 'thad do //
translated: Moreover, because it has an object that has already been apprehended, like memory and so on, it is not tenable that it is a valid cognition.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is so, but

original: gzung ba tsam kho na 'dzin par gyur pa na nye bar 'jal ba tshad ma nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzung ba tsam kho na 'dzin par gyur pa na nye bar 'jal ba tshad ma nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: when it apprehends merely the object that has been apprehended, analogy is not a valid cognition.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then is it?

original: 'dra bas khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dra bas khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: It is distinguished by similarity.

original: de ni de ltar sngar bzung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de ltar sngar bzung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not like that, because it does not apprehend what was previously apprehended.

original: de'i phyir bzung zin pa'i yul can nyid ma grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir bzung zin pa'i yul can nyid ma grub bo zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the subject that has already apprehended does not exist.

original: 'di mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di mi rigs te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: mngon sum kho na las de rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum kho na las de rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood only through direct perception.

original: 'dra bas khyad par du byas pa kho nar de sngar yang yongs su bcad pas so //
analyzed: 'dra bas khyad par du byas pa kho nar de sngar yang yongs su bcad pas so //
translated: Because it was previously determined only as distinguished by similarity.

original: 'di gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ba ste /
translated: This must be accepted without doubt.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na sngar ba lang mthong nas phyis ma he mthong ba'i yang ba lang la 'dra ba'i blor 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na sngar ba lang mthong nas phyis ma he mthong ba'i yang ba lang la 'dra ba'i blor 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Otherwise, having seen a cow previously, when one sees a buffalo later, the cognition of the cow would be similar. But that does not happen.

original: de'i phyir 'dra bas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos po 'dzin bzhin pa yang tshad ma gzhan du rtags pa'i ched du nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dra bas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos po 'dzin bzhin pa yang tshad ma gzhan du rtags pa'i ched du nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, while apprehending an entity distinguished by similarity, it is not possible to establish another valid cognition.

original: ci ste de lta na yang de yang 'ga' tsam zhig gis khyad par du byas pa 'dzin zhes pas tshad ma gzhan nyid du brtag bar bya na /
analyzed: ci ste de lta na yang de yang 'ga' tsam zhig gis khyad par du byas pa 'dzin zhes pas tshad ma gzhan nyid du brtag bar bya na /
translated: But if it is argued that even so, since it apprehends as distinguished by some similarity, another valid cognition should be posited,

original: mngon sum las yongs su gcad pa'i autpala sngon po'i rdzas la gang dus phyis 'byung ba'i autpala sngon po zhes 'dzin par de yang tshad ma gzhan du brtag par bya ba ste /
analyzed: mngon sum las yongs su gcad pa'i autpala sngon po'i rdzas la gang dus phyis 'byung ba'i autpala sngon po zhes 'dzin par de yang tshad ma gzhan du brtag par bya ba ste /
translated: The cognition that occurs later, which apprehends the substance of the blue lotus as a blue lotus, must be considered another valid cognition.

original: 'di la yang sngar autpala sngon po'i zhes pa'i rnam pa 'dis mngon sum las yongs su bcad pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'di la yang sngar autpala sngon po'i zhes pa'i rnam pa 'dis mngon sum las yongs su bcad pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: In this case, the cognition that apprehends the blue lotus as a blue lotus is not a valid cognition, because it is not a valid cognition that has a new object.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not a valid cognition that has a new object, because it is nonconceptual.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi de ni dbang po las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum kho na'i nang du 'dus par rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi de ni dbang po las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum kho na'i nang du 'dus par rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though this is so, it is still included in direct perception, because it is produced from the sense faculties.

original: tha snyad la mkhas pa'i dbang po'i shes pa yang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha snyad la mkhas pa'i dbang po'i shes pa yang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
translated: The cognition of the master of convention would also be conceptual.

original: de'i phyir 'dir thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, this consequence would apply to you.

original: 'di mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di mi rigs te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: brda la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brda la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it depends on a convention.

original: gzhan du na brda mngon bar mi shes pa yang de ltar yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na brda mngon bar mi shes pa yang de ltar yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one who does not understand the convention would also understand it in that way.

original: dbang po las byung ba brda la ltos pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las byung ba brda la ltos pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it that which arises from the sense faculty and depends on the convention,

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa mi gnas par gyur na mi rung ngo //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa mi gnas par gyur na mi rung ngo //
translated: because it is not proper that the ascertainment of the nature of a thing be unstable.

original: de ltar ni autpala sngon po'i bdag nyid du gang dngos po rnam par gnas pa de kho na la /
analyzed: de ltar ni autpala sngon po'i bdag nyid du gang dngos po rnam par gnas pa de kho na la /
translated: In this way, that which is the nature of a blue lotus is just the nature of a thing.

original: 'dod ba las ser po'i sgra brdar byas pa na /
analyzed: 'dod ba las ser po'i sgra brdar byas pa na /
translated: When the convention of yellow is made for it,

original: 'ga' zhig sngon po zhes zhen cing /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig sngon po zhes zhen cing /
translated: some conceive it as blue,

original: kha cig ser por zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig ser por zhes so //
translated: and some as yellow.

original: de'i phyir mi shes par gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi shes par gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if one does not understand,

original: ci ltar de'i dngos po @294a * //
analyzed: ci ltar de'i dngos po @294a * //
translated: how is that nature of a thing

original: rnam par gnas pa yin zhes pa'o //üîΩdngos po ji lta ba'i brda ni med de /
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa yin zhes pa'o // dngos po ji lta ba'i brda ni med de /
translated: established?üîΩThere is no convention that accords with the nature of a thing,

original: de 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa yang dngos po la rten ma nges pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa yang dngos po la rten ma nges pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is made according to desire, and desire is not definite in relation to a thing.

original: gzhan yang gal te mthong bzhin ba las gzhan pa'i lkog gyur la 'di dang de 'dra'o zhes 'dra ba nyid kyi blo ni tshad ma gzhan du rtog na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te mthong bzhin ba las gzhan pa'i lkog gyur la 'di dang de 'dra'o zhes 'dra ba nyid kyi blo ni tshad ma gzhan du rtog na /
translated: Moreover, if you think that the cognition of similarity, ‚ÄúThis is like that,‚Äù with regard to the hidden object that is different from the seen object is another valid cognition,

original: mthong bzhin pa las gzhan pa'i lkog gyur la 'di dang de mi 'dra ba'o zhes mi 'dra ba nyid kyi blo yang tshad ma gzhan bdun bar ci'i phyir brtag bar bya ba nyid ma yin zhing /
analyzed: mthong bzhin pa las gzhan pa'i lkog gyur la 'di dang de mi 'dra ba'o zhes mi 'dra ba nyid kyi blo yang tshad ma gzhan bdun bar ci'i phyir brtag bar bya ba nyid ma yin zhing /
translated: then why is the cognition of dissimilarity, ‚ÄúThis is not like that,‚Äù with regard to the hidden object that is different from the seen object not another valid cognition?

original: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las phyi rol du ma gyur ba nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las phyi rol du ma gyur ba nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
translated: Because it is not external to the valid cognition of nonentity.

original: ma yin te 'di ni dngos po'i yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te 'di ni dngos po'i yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That is not so, because it has an entity as its object.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so,

original: phan tshun med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na mi 'dra ba'i blo'i yul gang yin ba de ni dngos po med ba'i yul kho na ste /
analyzed: phan tshun med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na mi 'dra ba'i blo'i yul gang yin ba de ni dngos po med ba'i yul kho na ste /
translated: but that which is the object of the cognition of dissimilarity, which has a nature that is mutually exclusive, is the object of a nonentity alone.

original: de las kyang dngos po med pa'i yul can nyid du 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: de las kyang dngos po med pa'i yul can nyid du 'thad do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is tenable that it has a nonentity as its object.

original: gal te de lta na 'dra ba'i blo'i yul la yang tshul 'di yod do zhes pas 'dra ba'i blo yang dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las phyi rol du ma gyur par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'dra ba'i blo'i yul la yang tshul 'di yod do zhes pas 'dra ba'i blo yang dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las phyi rol du ma gyur par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that this is also the case with respect to the object of a similar cognition, then it follows, absurdly, that the similar cognition is not external to the valid cognition of the nonentity.

original: ci ste 'dra pa nyid kyi khyad par la mi ltos pa khyad par med pa kho nar mthong bzhin pa la ltos pa sngon mthong ba shes pa mthong bzhin pa ni nye bar 'jal ba'o zhes rtogs na de la yang nag ba yongs su bcad de /
analyzed: ci ste 'dra pa nyid kyi khyad par la mi ltos pa khyad par med pa kho nar mthong bzhin pa la ltos pa sngon mthong ba shes pa mthong bzhin pa ni nye bar 'jal ba'o zhes rtogs na de la yang nag ba yongs su bcad de /
translated: If you accept, then it is as we have said. If you say, It is not so because it does not depend on the difference of similarity, but rather it is the seeing of the difference itself, which is not dependent on anything else, that is the perception of the similar object, then we reply that this is not so.

original: dus phyis de'i bu yang rtogs nas /
analyzed: dus phyis de'i bu yang rtogs nas /
translated: Later, when the son is perceived,

original: 'di ltar de ni 'di'o pha'o zhes zhen par byed pa de la'ang sngar bzung ba'i nag ba la phyis mthong bzhin pa'i bu la ltos pa'i pha nyid du rtogs pa srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni 'di'o pha'o zhes zhen par byed pa de la'ang sngar bzung ba'i nag ba la phyis mthong bzhin pa'i bu la ltos pa'i pha nyid du rtogs pa srid pa kho na'o //
translated: one thinks, This is his son, and at that time it is possible to think, This is the father of that one who was previously apprehended and is now being seen.

original: de bzhin du skas kyi phreng ba la 'dzeg pa na /üîΩspang leb dang po 'das shing /
analyzed: de bzhin du skas kyi phreng ba la 'dzeg pa na / spang leb dang po 'das shing /
translated: Similarly, when one climbs a flight of stairs,

original: spang leb gnyis pa thob pa na /
analyzed: spang leb gnyis pa thob pa na /
translated: after the first step has been passed and the second step has been reached,üîΩone thinks, I have gone up the stairs.

original: 'das zin ba'i spang leb la /
analyzed: 'das zin ba'i spang leb la /
translated: In the past, the present, and the future,

original: 'di las de snga ma'o zhes mthong bzhin pa'i spang leb la ltos pas rnam par shes par 'gyur ro zhes pas de yang nye bar 'jal ba nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'di las de snga ma'o zhes mthong bzhin pa'i spang leb la ltos pas rnam par shes par 'gyur ro zhes pas de yang nye bar 'jal ba nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: the cognition of the past and future is in dependence on the present.

original: de 'dong pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'dong pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But the past and future are not the present.

original: de'i phyir 'di tshad ma nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di tshad ma nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that these are valid cognitions.

original: de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang ste /
translated: Similarly, the others, such as the cognition of the self,

original: gang tshad ma gzhan nyid du btags ba'i tshad ma de rnams kyang rjes su dpag ba'i rnam par rtog pa las mi gzhan pa nyid kyi phyir tshad ma gzhan @294b nyid yin par 'dod pa spang bar bya ba rnams yin no //
analyzed: gang tshad ma gzhan nyid du btags ba'i tshad ma de rnams kyang rjes su dpag ba'i rnam par rtog pa las mi gzhan pa nyid kyi phyir tshad ma gzhan @294b nyid yin par 'dod pa spang bar bya ba rnams yin no //
translated: are also not valid cognitions, because they are not different from the conceptual thought that infers.

original: de la zhe drag pa ni zhe drag cing brjod nas nges bar bstan pa 'jug par byed pa brgyud par 'os pa'i tshig ste dper na nags 'di na gnod sbyin gnas so zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de la zhe drag pa ni zhe drag cing brjod nas nges bar bstan pa 'jug par byed pa brgyud par 'os pa'i tshig ste dper na nags 'di na gnod sbyin gnas so zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: In this regard, a ‚Äústrong‚Äù word is a word that is used to express a strong sense, a word that is used to introduce a statement that is to be emphatically taught, such as ‚Äúyak·π£as live in this forest.‚Äù

original: 'di yang brjod par 'dod pa na sgra las byung ba nyid las tha mi dad de /
analyzed: 'di yang brjod par 'dod pa na sgra las byung ba nyid las tha mi dad de /
translated: And this is not different from the verbal, when it is desired to be expressed.

original: phyi rol gyi don la ni 'di'i tshad ma nyid kho na med do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la ni 'di'i tshad ma nyid kho na med do //
translated: For external objects, there is no valid cognition of it at all.

original: srid pa zhes bya ba gang du gang srid pa de gzung ba las srid pa can du yod pa nyid 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: srid pa zhes bya ba gang du gang srid pa de gzung ba las srid pa can du yod pa nyid 'dzin pa ste /
translated: Existence is that which exists somewhere, and the existence of the possessor is grasped from the grasping of it.

original: dper na khal 'dzin pa las bre gang yod pa nyid du gzung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na khal 'dzin pa las bre gang yod pa nyid du gzung ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the existence of a measure of a load is grasped from the grasping of the load.

original: 'di yang tshogs ba rnam par gzhag pa yi //
analyzed: 'di yang tshogs ba rnam par gzhag pa yi //
translated: And this is also established by the collection.

original: rgyu ni tshogs pa can yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: rgyu ni tshogs pa can yin no zhes pas /
translated: The cause is the possessor of the collection.

original: khal 'dras bu'i rtags kho na las 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: khal 'dras bu'i rtags kho na las 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The load is grasped only from the sign of the load.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa kho na'i nang du 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa kho na'i nang du 'dus pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is included only in inference.

original: don gyis go ba la sogs pa rnams ni sngar kho nar bsgrub par byas so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: don gyis go ba la sogs pa rnams ni sngar kho nar bsgrub par byas so zhes pa'o //
translated: The understanding of meaning, etc., have already been established earlier.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ste /
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ste /
translated: Direct perception and inference,

original: tshad ma dag gnyis kho na'o zhes pa 'di ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma dag gnyis kho na'o zhes pa 'di ni gnas pa'o //
translated: these two alone are the valid cognitions. This is the position.

original: le'u lnga pa'o /
analyzed: le'u lnga pa'o /
translated: The fifth chapter.

original: // / tshad ma gnyis su gnas so zhes pa tshad ma dag go //
analyzed: // / tshad ma gnyis su gnas so zhes pa tshad ma dag go //
translated: The two valid cognitions are established. The valid cognitions are the two.

original: gnyis dag kho na'o zhes gang dam bcas ba de sgra las byung ba la sogs pa rnams tshad ma gzhan nyid bkag pas rnam pas gnas so zhes dam bca' brtan par byed pa nyid ston to //
analyzed: gnyis dag kho na'o zhes gang dam bcas ba de sgra las byung ba la sogs pa rnams tshad ma gzhan nyid bkag pas rnam pas gnas so zhes dam bca' brtan par byed pa nyid ston to //
translated: The statement they are only two is a firm assertion. The author shows that this assertion is established by the refutation of the fact that verbal testimony, etc. are other valid cognitions.

original: de la tshad ma brjod pa'i dgos pa ni sngar kho nar brjod zin to //
analyzed: de la tshad ma brjod pa'i dgos pa ni sngar kho nar brjod zin to //
translated: The purpose of stating the valid cognitions has already been stated earlier.

original: tshad ma ltar snang ba rnams kyi ni brjod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i ched du phyogs snga ma nye bar dgod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: tshad ma ltar snang ba rnams kyi ni brjod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i ched du phyogs snga ma nye bar dgod pa gsungs pa /
translated: In order to show that the purpose is not stated for the seeming valid cognitions, the opponent's position is stated:

original: ci ste ci'i don zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste ci'i don zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: But what is the purpose of the valid cognitions?

original: tshad ma ni dos bo'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i thabs te /
analyzed: tshad ma ni dos bo'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i thabs te /
translated: Valid cognition is the means of knowing the reality of objects.

original: de'i phyir de nye bar ston pa ni don dang ldan no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nye bar ston pa ni don dang ldan no //
translated: Therefore, the statement of it is meaningful.

original: de skad du yang bshad pa /
analyzed: de skad du yang bshad pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gang gi phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa ni tshad ma pa rag las la zhes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa ni tshad ma pa rag las la zhes so //
translated: Because the understanding of the object depends on valid cognition.

original: tshad ma ltar snang ba nye bar bstan pa la ni dgos pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma ltar snang ba nye bar bstan pa la ni dgos pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is not the slightest purpose in teaching fallacious means of valid cognition.

original: de'i phyir bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o//
analyzed: de'i phyir bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o//
translated: Therefore, it is not to be done.

original: gang la dgos pa med pa de bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang la dgos pa med pa de bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That which has no purpose is not to be done.

original: ji ltar dgos pa med pa gzhan 'ga' zhig bzhin /
analyzed: ji ltar dgos pa med pa gzhan 'ga' zhig bzhin /
translated: It is like some other thing which has no purpose.

original: tshad ma ltar snang ba nye bar bstan pa yang dgos ba med pa'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma ltar snang ba nye bar bstan pa yang dgos ba med pa'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa'o //
translated: The teaching of fallacious means of valid cognition is also without purpose.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni phyogs dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe'i @295a * //üîΩskyon rnams gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni phyogs dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe'i @295a * // skyon rnams gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the faults of position, reason, and example.

original: tshad ma ltar snang smra rnams kyi zhes ba la sogs pas ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: tshad ma ltar snang smra rnams kyi zhes ba la sogs pas ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed de /
translated: He clarifies the nonestablishment of the opponent‚Äôs position by ‚ÄúThose who propound fallacious means of valid cognition, etc.‚Äù

original: ji ltar yan lag rig par smra pa rnams kyi phyogs grub par gyur ba de ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar yan lag rig par smra pa rnams kyi phyogs grub par gyur ba de ltar /
translated: Just as the position of those who propound the knowledge of the parts is established,

original: tshad ma ltar snang smra rnams kyi //
analyzed: tshad ma ltar snang smra rnams kyi //
translated: so it is not for those who propound fallacious means of valid cognition.

original: ma gyur cig ste 'gyur ba min no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ma gyur cig ste 'gyur ba min no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is not so, is the meaning.

original: mnyam nas ma tshang la sogs brjod //
analyzed: mnyam nas ma tshang la sogs brjod //
translated: Having been equal, they say that there is incompleteness, etc.

original: de'i phyogs 'grub ba des par zlog pa'i don du'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i phyogs 'grub ba des par zlog pa'i don du'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder is this: in order to prevent the establishment of that position.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'brel par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'brel par gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, the connection is stated:

original: phyogs 'grub pa des bar bzlog pa'i ched du ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa sgrub byed kyi skyon rnams bshad do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs 'grub pa des bar bzlog pa'i ched du ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa sgrub byed kyi skyon rnams bshad do zhes pa'o //
translated: The faults of the proof, such as incompleteness, are explained in order to prevent the establishment of that position.

original: ngag tsam la mkhas pa dngos bo'i de kho na nyid mi shes pa de rnams sgrub byed ltar snang ba tsam gyis kyang bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de 'grub pa bzlog pa'i ched du sgrub bar byed pa'i skyon rnams bshad do
analyzed: ngag tsam la mkhas pa dngos bo'i de kho na nyid mi shes pa de rnams sgrub byed ltar snang ba tsam gyis kyang bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de 'grub pa bzlog pa'i ched du sgrub bar byed pa'i skyon rnams bshad do
translated: Those who are skilled in mere words, who do not understand the reality of things, think that the probandum is established by mere apparent proofs. In order to prevent the establishment of that position, the faults of the proof are explained.

original: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de ltar na tshad ma ltar snang pa ston pa'i dgos pa ni ldog bar rtogs pa sel ba'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na tshad ma ltar snang pa ston pa'i dgos pa ni ldog bar rtogs pa sel ba'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the purpose of teaching the apparent valid cognitions is to eliminate the misconception of stopping.

original: de phyir de ston pa nyid ni zhes pa gang gi phyir ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya grub par mi 'gyur pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de phyir de ston pa nyid ni zhes pa gang gi phyir ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya grub par mi 'gyur pa de'i phyir /
translated: Since the probandum is not established by the incompleteness, etc.,

original: ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa de rnams ston pa ni rigs ba'i lan du brjod pa yin no //üîΩder snang ba ni rjod byed pa nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba rjod bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa de rnams ston pa ni rigs ba'i lan du brjod pa yin no // der snang ba ni rjod byed pa nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba rjod bar byed pa ni /
translated: the teaching of those incompleteness, etc., is a response that is reasonable.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.

original: ltag chod du ste zhes pa de ltar snang ba rjod bar byed pa ni /üîΩltag chod rnams kyi nang du 'du'o zhes ston to //üîΩlen ltar snang sun 'byin ba ltar snang ba'o zhes ba'i don to //
analyzed: ltag chod du ste zhes pa de ltar snang ba rjod bar byed pa ni / ltag chod rnams kyi nang du 'du'o zhes ston to // len ltar snang sun 'byin ba ltar snang ba'o zhes ba'i don to //
translated: The appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.

original: ci'i phyir de ston pa rigs pa'i lan yin zhe na gsungs pa /üîΩgang gi phyir 'di rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ston pa rigs pa'i lan yin zhe na gsungs pa / gang gi phyir 'di rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.üîΩThe appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incompleteness, etc., as if it were the teaching of the expression, etc.

original: ci'i phyir ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba ston pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba ston pa /
translated: The appearance there is the teaching of the appearance of the incomple

original: lan gyi skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa 'dis ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lan gyi skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa 'dis ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If you say that the fault lies in the answer, then this is not so, etc.

original: phrad ma phrad la mi 'dod brjod//
analyzed: phrad ma phrad la mi 'dod brjod//
translated: The non-assertion of the reason in regard to the meeting and not meeting is expressed.

original: zhes pa phrad pa dang lhan cig pa'i ma phrad pa ni phrad ma phrad do //
analyzed: zhes pa phrad pa dang lhan cig pa'i ma phrad pa ni phrad ma phrad do //
translated: The meeting and the not meeting together are the meeting and not meeting.

original: de yod pa la gtan tshigs kyi mi 'dod brjod /
analyzed: de yod pa la gtan tshigs kyi mi 'dod brjod /
translated: In regard to the existence of that, the non-assertion of the reason is expressed.

original: dus gsum pa la yang mi 'dod brjod //
analyzed: dus gsum pa la yang mi 'dod brjod //
translated: The non-assertion of the reason is expressed in regard to the three times.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gtan tshigs kyi zhes 'jug go //üîΩde la phrad dang ma phrad la //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gtan tshigs kyi zhes 'jug go // de la phrad dang ma phrad la //
translated: Why is that? The reason is expressed.

original: gtan tshigs mi 'dod brjod pa zhes ba 'di @295b ni phrad ma phrad mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs mi 'dod brjod pa zhes ba 'di @295b ni phrad ma phrad mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: In regard to that, the non-assertion of the reason in regard to the meeting and not meeting is expressed. This is the characteristic of the equivalence of the meeting and not meeting.

original: lhag ma ni rtags min mtshungs ba'i'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rtags min mtshungs ba'i'o //
translated: The remainder is the equivalence of the non-reason.

original: phrad ma phrad rtags min zhes bya //üîΩzhes ba mtshan bya nges par ston pa'o //
analyzed: phrad ma phrad rtags min zhes bya // zhes ba mtshan bya nges par ston pa'o //
translated: The meeting and not meeting are not the reason.üîΩThis teaches the certainty of the characteristic of the object.

original: dpe brjod dang bcas pa'i gtan tshigs la zhes ba sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs ba nyid du gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: dpe brjod dang bcas pa'i gtan tshigs la zhes ba sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs ba nyid du gsal bar byed do //
translated: The reason together with the example is expressed. This clarifies the completeness of the application.

original: bsgrub bya dang khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhes pa gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub par bya bar 'thob bo zhes ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhes pa gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub par bya bar 'thob bo zhes ba'o //
translated: The reason would be established as the probandum.

original: ci lta bu bzhin du zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci lta bu bzhin du zhen gsungs pa /
translated: In what way?

original: chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i chu phrad pa la khyad bar med ba bzhin zhes pa /
analyzed: chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i chu phrad pa la khyad bar med ba bzhin zhes pa /
translated: Like the water of the rivers and the ocean, there is no difference.

original: phrad pa dag kyang yin la de chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i chu dag kyang zhes pa las 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: phrad pa dag kyang yin la de chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i chu dag kyang zhes pa las 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The rivers and the ocean are connected, and their waters are connected.

original: de dag ji ltar khyad par med pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag ji ltar khyad par med pa de bzhin no //
translated: Just as there is no difference between them, so it is here.

original: ma grub pa dang phrad pa med pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: ma grub pa dang phrad pa med pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because there is no connection with the unestablished.

original: snga ma ni phrad ba khas blangs nas khyad par med pa brjod bas gtan tshigs ltar snang bar brjod la /
analyzed: snga ma ni phrad ba khas blangs nas khyad par med pa brjod bas gtan tshigs ltar snang bar brjod la /
translated: The former, having accepted the connection, states the non-difference, and so states the apparent reason.

original: da lta ni phrad pa med pa kho na'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: da lta ni phrad pa med pa kho na'o zhes ston to //
translated: Now, it is shown that there is no connection at all.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yong yongs su ma grub na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yong yongs su ma grub na /
translated: If the probandum is not completely established,

original: de ci ltar gtan tshigs grub ba dang phrad par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ci ltar gtan tshigs grub ba dang phrad par 'gyur /
translated: how can the reason be established as connected with it?

original: ci ste phrad pa 'grub pa'i don du bsgrub bya yongs su grub bar 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste phrad pa 'grub pa'i don du bsgrub bya yongs su grub bar 'dod na /
translated: But if you assert that the probandum is already established in order to establish contact,

original: de ltar gyur na 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin /
translated: then what is the point of this?

original: gtan tshigs ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed ba'i ched du 'dod ba yin na gal te de grub na 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin zhes pa gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed ba'i ched du 'dod ba yin na gal te de grub na 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin zhes pa gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a reason is asserted in order to establish the probandum, then if that is established, what is the point of this? It follows that there is no reason.üîΩBut if you say that the reason is ‚Äúbecause of noncontact,‚Äù

original: ci ste ma phrad pas zhes ba gtan tshigs bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa zhes sbrel lo //
analyzed: ci ste ma phrad pas zhes ba gtan tshigs bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa zhes sbrel lo //
translated: then it is connected to the establishment of the probandum.

original: ma phrad pa rnams khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes ba ji ltar mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid la sogs pa bsgrub bya lam phrad pa rnams gtan tshigs ma yin ba de ltar 'di yang gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ma phrad pa rnams khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes ba ji ltar mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid la sogs pa bsgrub bya lam phrad pa rnams gtan tshigs ma yin ba de ltar 'di yang gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Because of the absence of difference between those that do not contact, just as the probandum, such as being perceptible by the eye, and so on, are not reasons when they contact the subject, so too this is not a reason.

original: de lta na yang gtan tshigs med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang gtan tshigs med pa kho na'o //
translated: But in that case, there is no reason at all.

original: bsgrub bya med pa la ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin zhes pa ci'i yang ma yin pa kho na'o zhes ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya med pa la ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin zhes pa ci'i yang ma yin pa kho na'o zhes ba'i don to //
translated: If the probandum does not exist, what is the logical reason? The meaning is that it is nothing at all.

original: bsgrub bya la ltos nas ni 'di gtan tshigs nyid yin pa la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya la ltos nas ni 'di gtan tshigs nyid yin pa la /
translated: In dependence on the probandum, it is a logical reason.

original: bsgrub bya med na de mi rigs pas so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya med na de mi rigs pas so //
translated: If the probandum does not exist, that is not reasonable.

original: ci ste bsgrub par bya ba las gtan tshigs phyes kho na yin na de ltar na bsgrub par bya ba grub na /
analyzed: ci ste bsgrub par bya ba las gtan tshigs phyes kho na yin na de ltar na bsgrub par bya ba grub na /
translated: But if the logical reason is only different from the probandum, then when the probandum is established,

original: 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin /
analyzed: 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin /
translated: what is the logical reason for that?

original: gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs dang ldan ba'i dngos po mi 'grub bo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs dang ldan ba'i dngos po mi 'grub bo zhes pa'o //
translated: The logical reason and the thing possessing the logical reason are not established.

original: @296a * // gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid kyi gzugs brnyan dag ste zhes pa gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba dag go zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: @296a * // gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid kyi gzugs brnyan dag ste zhes pa gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba dag go zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The illustrations of the incompleteness of the logical reason are the apparent disputes about the incompleteness of the logical reason.

original: rjod par byed pa la brjod par bya ba nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa la brjod par bya ba nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of expression is imputed to the expression.

original: yang ci'i phyir gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid kyi rtsod pa dag kho nar mi 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid kyi rtsod pa dag kho nar mi 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why, then, are not all arguments defective because of the incompleteness of the reason?

original: mi rigs pas gtan tshigs thams cad la skur ba 'debs ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'dir gtan tshigs spyi bzung nas mi rigs pa nyid du rtsod kyi /
analyzed: mi rigs pas gtan tshigs thams cad la skur ba 'debs ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'dir gtan tshigs spyi bzung nas mi rigs pa nyid du rtsod kyi /
translated: [Dharmakƒ´rti] says, ‚ÄúBecause of the irrationality of the denial of all reasons.‚Äù Here, taking the general of reasons, [Dharmakƒ´rti] argues that [the opponent‚Äôs position] is irrational.

original: khyad par rtsol ba las byung ba kho na la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par rtsol ba las byung ba kho na la ni ma yin no //
translated: [The opponent‚Äôs position] does not arise from a particular argument.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs thams cad la skur pa btab pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs thams cad la skur pa btab pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is a denial of all reasons.

original: 'di la rigs pa ci yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la rigs pa ci yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the logic of this?

original: gang tshul gsum pa nyid de ni don gyis rtogs par byed pa nyid kyang mngon par brjod pa ni rtags kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gang tshul gsum pa nyid de ni don gyis rtogs par byed pa nyid kyang mngon par brjod pa ni rtags kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The trimodal condition is the very thing that causes understanding of the meaning. The statement of that is the definition of a reason.

original: de dang ldan ba yang gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur bar byas zhes pa 'di la rigs pa ci yang med do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dang ldan ba yang gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur bar byas zhes pa 'di la rigs pa ci yang med do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: There is no logic at all in the claim that [a reason] that possesses that is not a reason.

original: 'di yang bsgrub par bya ba rnam ba gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di yang bsgrub par bya ba rnam ba gnyis te /
translated: This also has two parts: the thesis statement and the argument.

original: bskyed par bya ba'am shes bar bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba'am shes bar bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it is produced or it is known.

original: de la bskyed par bya ba ni blo ste /
analyzed: de la bskyed par bya ba ni blo ste /
translated: Of these, the produced is the cognition.

original: shes par bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes par bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: The known is impermanence.

original: gtan tshigs kyang rjod par byed ba'am don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang rjod par byed ba'am don to //
translated: The reason is the expression or the meaning.

original: de la bskyed par bya ba'i bsgrub bya'i dbang du byas nas gal te brjod na /
analyzed: de la bskyed par bya ba'i bsgrub bya'i dbang du byas nas gal te brjod na /
translated: If, with regard to the produced probandum, it is expressed,

original: ci ltar ma phrad pa dang chos mthun pa nyid las gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ltar ma phrad pa dang chos mthun pa nyid las gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: how can it be a reason that is similar to the non-encountered?

original: ma phrad pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin ba kho na la 'jug pa ma yin pas te /
analyzed: ma phrad pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin ba kho na la 'jug pa ma yin pas te /
translated: The non-encountered does not occur only in the case of a non-reason,

original: 'o na ci zhe na gtan tshigs la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na gtan tshigs la yang ngo //
translated: but also in the case of a reason.

original: de ltar ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams blo dang phrad pa yang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams blo dang phrad pa yang ma yin zhing /
translated: Thus, the cognitions of form, etc. are not encountered,

original: de ste yang de'i skyed par byed pa rnams yin bas so //
analyzed: de ste yang de'i skyed par byed pa rnams yin bas so //
translated: but they are produced by them.

original: ma phrad pa'i phyogs la brten pa las kyang /
analyzed: ma phrad pa'i phyogs la brten pa las kyang /
translated: Even if it is based on the non-encountered side,

original: phrad par bya ba sgrub par mi byed do zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba sgrub par mi byed do zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not established that there is no encounter.

original: de bzhin du bsgrub bya las sngar zhes pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgrub bya las sngar zhes pa /
translated: Likewise, with respect to the statement ‚Äúprior to the probandum,‚Äù

original: sngar rgyu dang phyi nas bsgrub bar bya ba blor 'dod na /
analyzed: sngar rgyu dang phyi nas bsgrub bar bya ba blor 'dod na /
translated: if you assert that the reason is in the mind prior to the probandum,

original: de la bsgrub par bya ba med na 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin zhes gang brjod pa de mi rigs te /
analyzed: de la bsgrub par bya ba med na 'di ci zhig gi gtan tshigs yin zhes gang brjod pa de mi rigs te /
translated: then it would be illogical to say, ‚ÄúIf the probandum does not exist, with respect to what would the reason be a reason?‚Äù

original: de ltar ni bsgrub bar bya ba med pa kho na la gtan tshigs kyi don te /
analyzed: de ltar ni bsgrub bar bya ba med pa kho na la gtan tshigs kyi don te /
translated: This is because the meaning of the reason is only that the probandum does not exist.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs par nges pa skyes zin ba na gtan tshigs kyis dgos pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs par nges pa skyes zin ba na gtan tshigs kyis dgos pa ci yang med do //
translated: If the ascertainment of impermanence, etc., has already arisen, then there is no need for a reason.

original: ma skyes ba na gtan tshigs @296b zhes pa'i tha snyad du mi 'gyur ba 'di tsam zhig tu ni mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma skyes ba na gtan tshigs @296b zhes pa'i tha snyad du mi 'gyur ba 'di tsam zhig tu ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: It would not be the case that the mere fact that the reason does not arise would prevent the term ‚Äúreason‚Äù from being used,

original: bu ma skyes pa na pha'i tha snyad bzhin no //
analyzed: bu ma skyes pa na pha'i tha snyad bzhin no //
translated: just as the mere fact that the son has not yet been born does not prevent the term ‚Äúfather‚Äù from being used.

original: 'di tsam gyis sgrub byed min pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin ta /
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis sgrub byed min pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin ta /
translated: It is also illogical to say that this alone is not a proof.

original: 'bras bu skyed bar byed pa ni tha snyad la 'brel ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu skyed bar byed pa ni tha snyad la 'brel ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The producer of the effect is not related to the term.

original: 'o na ci zhe na nus pa la ste /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na nus pa la ste /
translated: What is it related to? It is related to the capacity.

original: de yang yod do zhes pas 'di ni gtan tshigs ma yin pa ma yin no thams cad la skur ba 'debs pa'i skyon 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: de yang yod do zhes pas 'di ni gtan tshigs ma yin pa ma yin no thams cad la skur ba 'debs pa'i skyon 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is there the fault of denying everything,

original: rang nyid 'joms pa nyid kyi skyon yang ste /
analyzed: rang nyid 'joms pa nyid kyi skyon yang ste /
translated: there is also the fault of self-destruction.

original: rang nyid 'joms pa 'di'i ngang tshul lo zhes pa ba dag nyid 'joms ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid 'joms pa 'di'i ngang tshul lo zhes pa ba dag nyid 'joms ba'o //
translated: This is the nature of self-destruction.

original: yang na rang nyid 'joms pa ni bdag nyid 'joms ba ste /
analyzed: yang na rang nyid 'joms pa ni bdag nyid 'joms ba ste /
translated: Or, self-destruction is self-destruction.

original: de 'di la yang yod pas na rang nyid 'joms pa can no //
analyzed: de 'di la yang yod pas na rang nyid 'joms pa can no //
translated: Since this also exists for you, it has self-destruction.

original: de'i dngos po ni rang nyid 'joms pa can nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni rang nyid 'joms pa can nyid do //
translated: Its nature is self-destruction.

original: de kho na skyon no //
analyzed: de kho na skyon no //
translated: That is the fault.

original: ci'i phyir 'di yang skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di yang skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is this also a fault? It is said:

original: dgag pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: dgag pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir //
translated: Because of the equivalence of negation.

original: zhes pa / gal te sun 'byin 'di sun dbyung bya dang phrad nas sun 'byin na sun dbyung bya dang khyad par med par 'thob bo zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / gal te sun 'byin 'di sun dbyung bya dang phrad nas sun 'byin na sun dbyung bya dang khyad par med par 'thob bo zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad brjod par bya'o //
translated: If this refutation refutes the refutand after contact, then it would obtain no difference from the refutand. All of this should be stated.

original: de bzhin du sun 'byin ba 'di sun dbyung bya las sngar yin na sun dbyung bya med na 'di ci zhig gi sun 'byin pa yin zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad 'di la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sun 'byin ba 'di sun dbyung bya las sngar yin na sun dbyung bya med na 'di ci zhig gi sun 'byin pa yin zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad 'di la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, all of the following should be said to the opponent: ‚ÄúIf this refutation is prior to the refutand, then when the refutand does not exist, with respect to what is this a refutation?‚Äù

original: de ltar zhes ba de ma thag tu brjod pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes ba de ma thag tu brjod pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way‚Äù is in the manner just explained.

original: blo bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin na zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa'i sgra la dmigs ba'i blo bsgrub bar bya ba nyid du gang gi tshe ltos par bya ba de'i tshe tshig gi bdag nyid kyi gtan tshigs bkag pa'i phyir dang
analyzed: blo bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin na zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa'i sgra la dmigs ba'i blo bsgrub bar bya ba nyid du gang gi tshe ltos par bya ba de'i tshe tshig gi bdag nyid kyi gtan tshigs bkag pa'i phyir dang
translated: ‚ÄúIf the cognition is not to be established‚Äù means that when the cognition observing the sound qualified by impermanence is to be established, then at that time the reason consisting of the words is refuted,

original: gzhan yang mi ston pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma tshang bar snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan yang mi ston pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma tshang bar snang ba nyid do //
translated: and moreover, because it does not teach anything else, the reason appears to be incomplete.

original: don rtags yin nam grub snang ba dag go zhes ba gang gi tshe don gtan tshigs yin zhing /
analyzed: don rtags yin nam grub snang ba dag go zhes ba gang gi tshe don gtan tshigs yin zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúThe object is the reason or the appearance of the established‚Äù means that when the object is the reason,

original: blo kho na bsgrub bya yin ba de'i tshe tshig ma ba ka ga ste /
analyzed: blo kho na bsgrub bya yin ba de'i tshe tshig ma ba ka ga ste /
translated: and only the cognition is to be established, then the words are not the reason.

original: gtan tshigs kyi gnas su sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi gnas su sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is applied to the locus of the reason.

original: don gtan tshigs yin na ma grub ba ltar snang ba nyid de /
analyzed: don gtan tshigs yin na ma grub ba ltar snang ba nyid de /
translated: If the meaning is the reason, then it is not established, it appears to be.

original: gang dam bca' ba'i don gyi chos 'di ni ma grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dam bca' ba'i don gyi chos 'di ni ma grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But this property of the meaning of the thesis is not unestablished.

original: blo ni dam bca' ba'i don yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: blo ni dam bca' ba'i don yang ma yin gyi /
translated: The mind is not the meaning of the thesis,

original: 'o na ci zhe na mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par du byas ba'i sgra yin zhing /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par du byas ba'i sgra yin zhing /
translated: but rather the sound qualified by impermanence.

original: de'i yang chos su 'di 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pas ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩci ste yang bsgrub par bya ba las sngar phrad ba med pa'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs @297a * //
analyzed: de'i yang chos su 'di 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pas ma grub pa nyid ma yin no // ci ste yang bsgrub par bya ba las sngar phrad ba med pa'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs @297a * //
translated: And it is just this that is the property of that, so it is not unestablished.üîΩBut if you say that it is just unestablished because it is prior to the probandum and because there is no convention for the reason,

original: kyi tha snyad med pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: kyi tha snyad med pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: then he says:

original: chos rnams thams cad kyi //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad kyi //
translated: All dharmas

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: gtan tshigs gnyis kyis kyang zhes pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis kyis kyang zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the two reasons‚Äù

original: tshig gi bdag nyid dang don gyi bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: tshig gi bdag nyid dang don gyi bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: means by the nature of the words and by the nature of the meaning.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa shes par bya ba'i don bsgrub par bya ba la'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa shes par bya ba'i don bsgrub par bya ba la'o //
translated: in the matter to be understood, such as impermanence, etc.

original: 'dir yang ma tshang ba nyid dang ma grub ba nyid ltar snang ba dag ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang ma tshang ba nyid dang ma grub ba nyid ltar snang ba dag ste /
translated: Here also, the incompleteness and the non-establishment appear.

original: rim pa ji lta bar tshig rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir dang don grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa ji lta bar tshig rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir dang don grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: In order, because of the application of the words and because of the establishment of the matter.

original: de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed ba'i dngos po ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed ba'i dngos po ma yin gyi /
translated: Because they are not the entities of cause and effect, the probandum and the probans are not the entities of the produced and the producer.

original: 'o na ci zhe na shes par bya ba dang shes no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na shes par bya ba dang shes no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: What then? The matter to be understood and the understanding.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na smras pa /
translated: Why? It is said:

original: mi 'pho ba'i yang mthong ba ste /
analyzed: mi 'pho ba'i yang mthong ba ste /
translated: Because of the seeing of the non-transference.

original: dper na chu dang sprin bzhin du tha dad ba dang tha mi dad pa'i dus can dag la yang ste /
analyzed: dper na chu dang sprin bzhin du tha dad ba dang tha mi dad pa'i dus can dag la yang ste /
translated: For example, in the case of water and clouds, which are different and non-different,

original: rjes su dpag pa ni dus gsum pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas 'di mi rigs so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni dus gsum pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas 'di mi rigs so //
translated: The inference is not correct because of the three times.

original: rtag pa zhes bya zhes pa rtag pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa zhes bya zhes pa rtag pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPermanence‚Äù is the same as ‚Äúpermanent.‚Äù

original: mi rtag pa nyid /üîΩrjes su 'gro phyir rtag nyid thal //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid / rjes su 'gro phyir rtag nyid thal //
translated: Impermanence.üîΩBecause of following, permanence is implied.

original: zhes mi rtag pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba gtan tshigs las rtag pa nyid du kun du 'brel bar byed pa zhes pa'i don to ;
analyzed: zhes mi rtag pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba gtan tshigs las rtag pa nyid du kun du 'brel bar byed pa zhes pa'i don to ;
translated: The meaning is that impermanence is the reason for the connection with permanence.

original: / de rtag tu mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa thob ste /
analyzed: / de rtag tu mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa thob ste /
translated: He obtains permanence that is always impermanent.

original: gnas skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang mi rtag pa ma yin par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gnas skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang mi rtag pa ma yin par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is not impermanent at some time.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na smras pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: mi 'pho ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'pho ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because of the nature of non-transference.

original: chos rnams ni rang bzhin las 'pho ba ma yin te /
analyzed: chos rnams ni rang bzhin las 'pho ba ma yin te /
translated: Things do not transfer from their nature,

original: dper na me ni sreg bar byed pa nyid las bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na me ni sreg bar byed pa nyid las bzhin no //
translated: just as fire does not transfer from its nature of burning.

original: de'i phyir yang rtag pa kho na'o zhes pa sgra mi rtag pa la dus thams cad du mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa mi srid do zhes pas sgra rtag pa nyid du dam bca' bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang rtag pa kho na'o zhes pa sgra mi rtag pa la dus thams cad du mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa mi srid do zhes pas sgra rtag pa nyid du dam bca' bar 'gyur te /
translated: This means that it is impossible for sound to be impermanent and to possess impermanence at all times.

original: de las kyang rang tshig 'gal ba'o dam bca'i skyon ltar snang ba zhes pa rang tshig 'gal ba ltar snang ba zhes pa rang tshig 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de las kyang rang tshig 'gal ba'o dam bca'i skyon ltar snang ba zhes pa rang tshig 'gal ba ltar snang ba zhes pa rang tshig 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //
translated: This is a contradiction in terms.üîΩWhy is it so?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: mi rtag pa nyid sgro btags pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid sgro btags pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because impermanence is superimposed.

original: gang gi phyir pha rol pos tha dad par mi rtag pa nyid sgro 'dogs par byed do //üîΩ'o na gang la dngos po'i rkyen 'di yin pa mi rtag pa nyid yod @297b pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang gi phyir pha rol pos tha dad par mi rtag pa nyid sgro 'dogs par byed do // 'o na gang la dngos po'i rkyen 'di yin pa mi rtag pa nyid yod @297b pa ma yin nam /
translated: Because the opponent superimposes impermanence as different.

original: des na mi rtag pa nyid sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes cis brjod par byed ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na mi rtag pa nyid sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes cis brjod par byed ce na gsungs pa /
translated: Well, then, since impermanence does not exist in the thing that is the condition of sound, why is it said, ‚ÄúBecause impermanence is superimposed‚Äù?üîΩIt is said:

original: mi rtag ba nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag ba nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Impermanence is superimposed on sound.

original: gal te med na ci ltar mi rtag pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te med na ci ltar mi rtag pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it does not exist, how can it be impermanent?üîΩIt is said:

original: de kho na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na zhes pa'o //
translated: That itself.

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid don gzhan med na dngos po'i rkyen 'dis brjod bar bya ba ci yin zhe na gsungs ba /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid don gzhan med na dngos po'i rkyen 'dis brjod bar bya ba ci yin zhe na gsungs ba /
translated: If impermanence does not exist as a different object, what is expressed by this condition of the thing? It is said:

original: de yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: That also, etc.

original: ji ltar dngos po de kho na rang bzhin grub pa na pha rol gyi bya ba la ltos pa ni 'bras bu zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po de kho na rang bzhin grub pa na pha rol gyi bya ba la ltos pa ni 'bras bu zhes brjod cing /
translated: Just as when that thing itself is established as the nature, it is called the effect in dependence on the activity of another,

original: de'i gnas skabs de yang dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod pa de bzhin du sgra'i 'ang ji skad bshad pa'i gnas skabs ni dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs de yang dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod pa de bzhin du sgra'i 'ang ji skad bshad pa'i gnas skabs ni dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: and that state of it is expressed by the condition of the thing, in the same way, the state of the sound as it has been explained should be expressed by the condition of the thing.üîΩIn response to the statement ‚Äúprior to the expression,‚Äù etc., it is said:

original: brjod pa las sngar zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pa las sngon du rtags med pas /
analyzed: brjod pa las sngar zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pa las sngon du rtags med pas /
translated: Prior to the expression, the sign does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because of that,

original: bsgrub bya med par thal byed pa /
analyzed: bsgrub bya med par thal byed pa /
translated: the consequence that the probandum does not exist

original: de ni ma brjod mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ma brjod mtshungs pa'o //
translated: is the same as not being expressed.

original: zhes bya ba'i ltag chod kyi lan no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ltag chod kyi lan no //
translated: This is the response to the reductio.

original: rjod par byed pa las sngar zhes pa /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa las sngar zhes pa /
translated: Prior to the expression.

original: ji srid du brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i tshig mi brjod pa de srid du gtan tshigs med do //
analyzed: ji srid du brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i tshig mi brjod pa de srid du gtan tshigs med do //
translated: As long as the words ‚Äúbecause of arising immediately upon effort‚Äù are not uttered, there is no reason.

original: de las kyang sgra mi rtag pa ma yin par thal lo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang sgra mi rtag pa ma yin par thal lo zhes pa'o //
translated: And from that, it follows that sound is not impermanent.

original: sgro btags nas /
analyzed: sgro btags nas /
translated: Having imputed,

original: smra pa po'i ngag gis zhes pa rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa smra ba po'i tshig 'dis sgra la mi rtag pa nyid rjes su dpag par sgro btags nas /
analyzed: smra pa po'i ngag gis zhes pa rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa smra ba po'i tshig 'dis sgra la mi rtag pa nyid rjes su dpag par sgro btags nas /
translated: the speaker‚Äôs speech, because of arising immediately upon effort, by this speech of the speaker, having imputed the inference of impermanence in sound,

original: brjod pa las sngar de med par thal bar 'gyur bar byed de /
analyzed: brjod pa las sngar de med par thal bar 'gyur bar byed de /
translated: it follows that prior to the expression, it does not exist.

original: ma grub ltar snang /
analyzed: ma grub ltar snang /
translated: It appears as if it is not established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa don gyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa don gyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Why is that? It is said, ‚ÄúIn fact,‚Äù and so on.

original: snga ma zhes pa rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: snga ma zhes pa rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i dus su'o //
translated: The prior, at the time of the inference for oneself.

original: de med pa las zhes pa /
analyzed: de med pa las zhes pa /
translated: From the nonexistence of that,

original: don med pa las so //
analyzed: don med pa las so //
translated: from the nonexistent.

original: yang na nyung ltar snang /
analyzed: yang na nyung ltar snang /
translated: Or, it appears as if it is too little.

original: brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed dor //
analyzed: brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed dor //
translated: Prior to the expression, the proof is abandoned.

original: zhes pa gal te gtan tshigs brjod pa las sngar sgrub par byed par sgro btags nas gtan tshigs kyi tshig med par rtsod par byed na /
analyzed: zhes pa gal te gtan tshigs brjod pa las sngar sgrub par byed par sgro btags nas gtan tshigs kyi tshig med par rtsod par byed na /
translated: If, having imputed the proof to be prior to the statement of the reason, one argues without the words of the reason,

original: de lta na gtan tshigs ma tshang ba ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na gtan tshigs ma tshang ba ltar snang ba'o //
translated: then, in that case, the proof would be incomplete, as it were, because of the incompleteness of the reason.üîΩWhy is that?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:
