original: sgrub par byed pa'i dus su zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i dus su zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because at the time of the proof, etc.

original: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa'i dus kho nar gtan tshigs mi brjod pa ni gtan tshigs ma tshang ba'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i dus las gzhan gyi tshe gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir na sgrub par byed pa ma tshang ba
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa'i dus kho nar gtan tshigs mi brjod pa ni gtan tshigs ma tshang ba'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i dus las gzhan gyi tshe gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir na sgrub par byed pa ma tshang ba
translated: Because at the time of the proof alone the reason is not stated, the proof would be incomplete because of the incompleteness of the reason. Therefore, because the reason does not exist at a time other than the time of the proof, the proof is not incomplete.

original: ma yin par @298a * //
analyzed: ma yin par @298a * //
translated: It is reasonable.

original: rigs so // de ltar 'gyur mod kyi gtan tshigs kyi tshig las sdar kho nar 'di sgrub bar byed do zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: rigs so // de ltar 'gyur mod kyi gtan tshigs kyi tshig las sdar kho nar 'di sgrub bar byed do zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúAlthough that is so, the proof is just this at the time of the words of the reason,‚Äù then in response to that, it is said:

original: 'di yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is also not so, etc.

original: mtha' dag gi don can zhes mtha' dag pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' dag gi don can zhes mtha' dag pa ste /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúhaving the meaning of all‚Äù is as follows.

original: tshul gsum pa'i gtan tshigs gang gi don yin pa de mtha' dag gi don can te /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i gtan tshigs gang gi don yin pa de mtha' dag gi don can te /
translated: The reason having the three modes has the meaning of all,

original: tshul gsum brjod pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: tshul gsum brjod pa'i tshig go //
translated: the words expressing the three modes.

original: de med par rtsod bas khyad par med par dper brjod ston pa gnyis kyang med par rtsod par 'gyur ro zhes pas dpe brjod pa ma tshang ba nyid ltar snang ba nyid du yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de med par rtsod bas khyad par med par dper brjod ston pa gnyis kyang med par rtsod par 'gyur ro zhes pas dpe brjod pa ma tshang ba nyid ltar snang ba nyid du yang rig par bya'o //
translated: Since it is a dispute about nonexistence, the two, the example and the demonstration, would be disputes about nonexistence. Thus, it should be understood that the example is also incomplete.

original: skye ba las rtags med phyir zhes pa skye ba las sngar sgra las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid med do zhes pas 'di gtan tshigs ma yin pa nyid du rtsod par byed de /
analyzed: skye ba las rtags med phyir zhes pa skye ba las sngar sgra las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid med do zhes pas 'di gtan tshigs ma yin pa nyid du rtsod par byed de /
translated: Since it is a dispute about the reason, ‚Äúbecause of the nonexistence of a sign from arising,‚Äù the statement ‚Äúprior to arising, sound does not immediately arise from effort‚Äù is a dispute about the reason being unestablished.

original: lan 'di ni ma grub pa la brten pa dang bzlog par brten par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lan 'di ni ma grub pa la brten pa dang bzlog par brten par 'gyur te /
translated: This response is based on the unestablished and based on the opposite.

original: gang las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ma grub pa dang / rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid ni de las ldog pa brten te rtsod par byed ces pa'i don to /
analyzed: gang las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ma grub pa dang / rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid ni de las ldog pa brten te rtsod par byed ces pa'i don to /
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúone who is a proponent of the opposite of that which is not established from the very moment of the exertion, and of the opposite of that which does not occur from the very moment of the exertion‚Äù is that one should debate in dependence on the opposite of that.

original: de las kyang rtsol ma thag tu byung pa nyid med par thal bar byed cing /
analyzed: de las kyang rtsol ma thag tu byung pa nyid med par thal bar byed cing /
translated: Moreover, the consequence of the nonexistence of that which occurs from the very moment of the exertion is stated.

original: de las bzlog pa rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid grub pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa las bzlog pa rtag pa nyid yod par ro //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid grub pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa las bzlog pa rtag pa nyid yod par ro //
translated: And because the opposite of that, the existence of that which does not occur from the very moment of the exertion, is established, the opposite of impermanence, permanence, exists.

original: 'di kho na rnam par 'byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di kho na rnam par 'byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: This is precisely the analysis stated:

original: skye ba las sngar sgra rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba las sngar sgra rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPrior to arising, sound does not occur from the very moment of the exertion.‚ÄùüîΩThis is twofold

original: 'di ni rnam pa gnyis su zhes pa 'di ni 'dod zhes pa 'di dang sbrel lo //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa gnyis su zhes pa 'di ni 'dod zhes pa 'di dang sbrel lo //
translated: is connected with this, ‚ÄúThis is asserted.‚Äù

original: rnam pa gnyis nyid de ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid kyi phyir dang ma nges pa ltar snang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis nyid de ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid kyi phyir dang ma nges pa ltar snang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of being twofold is not established, it appears to be nonestablished, and because it is not ascertained, it appears to be nonascertained.

original: yang ci'i phyir rnam pa gnyis yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rnam pa gnyis yin zhe na /
translated: Again, why is it twofold?

original: gsungs ba gnyis su sgro btags ba las zhes pa'o //üîΩskye ba las sngar sgrub byed du sgro btags pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gsungs ba gnyis su sgro btags ba las zhes pa'o // skye ba las sngar sgrub byed du sgro btags pa'i phyir te /
translated: The two are superimpositions.üîΩBecause prior to arising, the superimposition of the probandum is made.

original: rtsol ma thag byung ba nyid du sgro gdags ba las so //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag byung ba nyid du sgro gdags ba las so //
translated: Because the superimposition of the arising of that which is immediately preceded by exertion is made.

original: de la sgro 'dogs pa lnga ma las ma grub pa ltar snang bar 'dod cing cig shos las ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de la sgro 'dogs pa lnga ma las ma grub pa ltar snang bar 'dod cing cig shos las ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste /
translated: In that regard, the five superimpositions are asserted to be like the unestablished, and like the uncertain.

original: don gyis go bas rtag pa nyid du sgro gdags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyis go bas rtag pa nyid du sgro gdags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the understood meaning, permanence is superimposed.üîΩWhy is it that it is like the unestablished?

original: yang ci'i phyir ma grub ba ltar snang ba nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir ma grub ba ltar snang ba nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: skyes pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Arising is not immediately preceded by exertion.

original: de la 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de la 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: skyes pa yang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid med do zhe na /
analyzed: skyes pa yang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid med do zhe na /
translated: Arising is not immediately preceded by exertion.üîΩIf it is said that arising is not immediately preceded by exertion,

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: then it is said:

original: de ni de'i tshe yod ba yang nga zhes pa sgra skyes ba @298b na'o ;
analyzed: de ni de'i tshe yod ba yang nga zhes pa sgra skyes ba @298b na'o ;
translated: At that time, it exists.üîΩBecause it does not arise immediately after exertion, it is said:

original: ; rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid kyi phyir ni zhe pa la sogs ba ste /
analyzed: ; rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid kyi phyir ni zhe pa la sogs ba ste /
translated: Arising is not immediately preceded by exertion.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung nyid kyi phyir mi rtag ces sras bas /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung nyid kyi phyir mi rtag ces sras bas /
translated: Because it arises immediately upon exertion, it is impermanent.

original: don gyis 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: don gyis 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning is expressed as follows:

original: rtsol ma thag tu ma byung pa nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o zhes par ro //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu ma byung pa nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o zhes par ro //
translated: Because it does not arise immediately upon exertion, it is permanent.

original: de'i klog la sogs pas ma nges so zhes pa 'di ltar ma nges ba ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i klog la sogs pas ma nges so zhes pa 'di ltar ma nges ba ltar snang ba'o //
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúIt is not ascertained by that.‚Äù This is an apparent non-ascertainment.

original: 'bras nyid gzhan nyid cha yis ni //
analyzed: 'bras nyid gzhan nyid cha yis ni //
translated: By the part of being the same or different from the effect,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: 'bras nyid de byas ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'bras nyid de byas ba nyid do //
translated: The effect itself is the same as the produced.

original: de'i gzhan gyi cha ste dbye ba'i cha'o //
analyzed: de'i gzhan gyi cha ste dbye ba'i cha'o //
translated: The part of being different from that is the part of division.

original: de lhur len pa'i gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub bya mi 'grub par tshig gang gis ston pa /
analyzed: de lhur len pa'i gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub bya mi 'grub par tshig gang gis ston pa /
translated: The statement that shows that the reason of being devoted to that does not establish the probandum is:

original: de ni 'bras mtshungs /
analyzed: de ni 'bras mtshungs /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is the same as the effect.‚Äù

original: gal te bum pa ni gzhan gyis byas pa nyid kyis zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te bum pa ni gzhan gyis byas pa nyid kyis zhes pa /
translated: If it is said that ‚Äúthe pot is produced by another,‚Äù

original: 'ji ba dbyu gu 'khor lo dang skud pa la sogs pa'i rgyus so //
analyzed: 'ji ba dbyu gu 'khor lo dang skud pa la sogs pa'i rgyus so //
translated: it is produced by the causes such as the lump of clay, the stick, the wheel, the thread, and so on.

original: 'dir sgra las cir zhes pa /
analyzed: 'dir sgra las cir zhes pa /
translated: Here, ‚Äúwhat from the word?‚Äù

original: gang las de dang 'dra bar mi rtag par 'gyur ba de'i byas ba nyid sgra la yod pa ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: gang las de dang 'dra bar mi rtag par 'gyur ba de'i byas ba nyid sgra la yod pa ni ma yin pas so //
translated: Because the productness that is like that impermanence does not exist in sound.

original: de'i tshe ma grub ba ltar snang ba'o zhes pa bum pa'i byas pa nyid sgra las ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe ma grub ba ltar snang ba'o zhes pa bum pa'i byas pa nyid sgra las ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: At that time, it is a pseudo nonestablishment, because the productness of a pot is not established in sound.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i mi rtag ba rnams la med ces pa /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i mi rtag ba rnams la med ces pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIn impermanent pots and so on‚Äù means

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa rnams kho na la zhes des par gzung bar blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa rnams kho na la zhes des par gzung bar blta bar bya ste /
translated: ‚Äúin just impermanent pots and so on,‚Äù because it is to be seen that way.

original: phyi ma la rtag pa rnams la yang med ces brjod ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi ma la rtag pa rnams la yang med ces brjod ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is stated that ‚Äúit does not exist in permanent things either.‚Äù

original: 'gal bas ltar snang ba'o zhes pa /
analyzed: 'gal bas ltar snang ba'o zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is a pseudo contradiction‚Äù

original: sgra'i gang byas pa nyid de mi mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i gang byas pa nyid de mi mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the productness of sound exists only in the discordant class.

original: ci ste 'di kho na zhes pa sgra'i byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: ci ste 'di kho na zhes pa sgra'i byas pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is just this‚Äù means the productness of sound.

original: dpe'i skyon ltar snang ba'am ste /
analyzed: dpe'i skyon ltar snang ba'am ste /
translated: It is a pseudo fault of the example.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: chos mthun pa nyid du nye bar blangs pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid du nye bar blangs pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because it is taken as a similarity.

original: chos mthun ba nyid du zhe bar blangs ba'i bum pa la byas ba nyid med de /
analyzed: chos mthun ba nyid du zhe bar blangs ba'i bum pa la byas ba nyid med de /
translated: There is no action in the pot that is taken to be similar to the phenomenon.

original: de'i phyir dpe sgrub byed dang bral ba'i skyon ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe sgrub byed dang bral ba'i skyon ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the example is flawed in that it is not established.

original: yang ci'i phyir khyad bar gzung nas rjes su dpag ba mi byed ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir khyad bar gzung nas rjes su dpag ba mi byed ce na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it that one does not make an inference by holding on to a distinction?üîΩHe says:

original: de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That is not so, etc.

original: khyad par ni don dang don la so sor nges pa ste /
analyzed: khyad par ni don dang don la so sor nges pa ste /
translated: A distinction is a determination of an object in relation to an object.

original: de'i phyir gal te 'di rjes su dpag pa la nye bar len na de ni spyi'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te 'di rjes su dpag pa la nye bar len na de ni spyi'o //
translated: Therefore, if this is taken to be an inference, it is a general one.

original: rjes su dpag pa med pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa med pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: It would not be an inference at all,

original: gtan tshigs thams cad med bar 'thob ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thams cad med bar 'thob ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that there are no reasons at all.

original: rjes su dpag pa yang yod de /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang yod de /
translated: There are inferences,

original: de'i phyir khyad bar yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o //üîΩdpe dang mi mthun phyogs dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩdpe dang dpe'i mi mthun phyogs ni dpe dang dpe'i @299a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad bar yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o // dpe dang mi mthun phyogs dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa ste / dpe dang dpe'i mi mthun phyogs ni dpe dang dpe'i @299a * //
translated: and therefore one should not hold on to a distinction.üîΩThe example and the discordant side, etc.

original: mi mthun phyogs dag ste /
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs dag ste /
translated: The example and the discordant side of the example are the example and the discordant side of the example.

original: yan lag gi ngo bo rnams la yang gcig lhag mthong bas te /
analyzed: yan lag gi ngo bo rnams la yang gcig lhag mthong bas te /
translated: Also, with respect to the entities of the parts, there is the one, insight.

original: yang dang tsak dag go zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dang tsak dag go zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: And also, and so on, just as it is.

original: de dag gi chos mthun nyid kyis bsgrub bar bya bar 'dod pa'i don las bzlog ba'i don tshig gang gis sgrub ste /
analyzed: de dag gi chos mthun nyid kyis bsgrub bar bya bar 'dod pa'i don las bzlog ba'i don tshig gang gis sgrub ste /
translated: By what words is the opposite of the meaning to be established, established, through the similarity of their attributes?

original: ston pa de chos mthun mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: ston pa de chos mthun mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The teacher is the same as the similar attribute.

original: sgrub byed kyi sgra ni dngos po la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa yang mthong ngo zhes pa de'i phyir de rnam par gcod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi sgra ni dngos po la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa yang mthong ngo zhes pa de'i phyir de rnam par gcod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: The word ‚Äúestablisher‚Äù is seen to establish such things as entities. Therefore, in order to eliminate that, he says,

original: byed pa'i byed pa can du byas nas so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa'i byed pa can du byas nas so zhes pa'o //
translated: having made it the agent of the action.

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa dper brjod rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa dper brjod rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: For example, and so on, he teaches the example.

original: sgra mi rtag ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor bar byas ba na ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi sbyor bar byas ba na ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa /
translated: Sound is impermanent, because of being a product, like space. When the opponent of the dissimilar attribute makes the application, the one who speaks the reductio says,

original: gal te dper gyur pa'i mi mthun phyogs dang chos mthun pa nyid las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir sgra mi rtag ba yin na dper byas pa'i nam mkha' dang chas mthun pa nyid las lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag par 'gyurüîΩro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gal te dper gyur pa'i mi mthun phyogs dang chos mthun pa nyid las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir sgra mi rtag ba yin na dper byas pa'i nam mkha' dang chas mthun pa nyid las lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: If sound is impermanent because of being produced by effort, like the example, then sound would be permanent because of being non-physical, like space, the example.

original: de bzhin du bum pa chos mthun pa nyid du byas pa'i sbyor ba la ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa /üîΩgal te dper byas pa'i bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid las sgra mi rtag ba yin na dper byas pa'i mi mthun phyogs nam mkha' dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa chos mthun pa nyid du byas pa'i sbyor ba la ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa / gal te dper byas pa'i bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid las sgra mi rtag ba yin na dper byas pa'i mi mthun phyogs nam mkha' dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Similarly, in a syllogism where a pot is the similar example, a sophist says:üîΩIf sound is impermanent because of being produced by effort, like the example, the pot, then sound would be permanent because of being non-physical, like space, the example.

original: lus can ma yin pa nyid las rtag pa'o zhes pa 'di chos mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa nyid las rtag pa'o zhes pa 'di chos mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa'o //
translated: This is similar to the similarity of the example.

original: snga ma lta bu'i dpe gnyis la bum pa dang chos mi mthun par sbyar par bya'o zhes ba ji ltar chos mthun pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi dpe gnyis la /
analyzed: snga ma lta bu'i dpe gnyis la bum pa dang chos mi mthun par sbyar par bya'o zhes ba ji ltar chos mthun pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi dpe gnyis la /
translated: The two examples in the first case are to be applied as dissimilar to the pot.

original: nam mkha' dang chos mthun pa nyid du sbyar ba de ltar 'di yang bum pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang chos mthun pa nyid du sbyar ba de ltar 'di yang bum pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the two examples of similarity are applied as similar to space, so this is to be applied as dissimilar to the pot.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: sgra mi rtag ste brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Sound is impermanent because it arises only when effort is applied.

original: bum pa chos mthun pa nyid du byas pa la /
analyzed: bum pa chos mthun pa nyid du byas pa la /
translated: The pot is made to be similar.

original: pha rol pos smras pa /
analyzed: pha rol pos smras pa /
translated: The opponent says:

original: gal te dper byas pa'i bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid las sgra mi rtag ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te dper byas pa'i bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid las sgra mi rtag ba yin na /
translated: If sound is impermanent because of arising only when effort is applied, which is similar to the pot that is the example,üîΩthen sound is permanent because of being a product, which is similar to the pot.

original: dper gyur pa'i bum pa dang chos mi mthun pa las lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o zhes pa dang / de bzhin du mi rtag ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' chos mi mthun pa @299b nyid du byas pa la /
analyzed: dper gyur pa'i bum pa dang chos mi mthun pa las lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o zhes pa dang / de bzhin du mi rtag ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' chos mi mthun pa @299b nyid du byas pa la /
translated: For example, ‚ÄúIt is permanent because it is not an embodied thing, unlike a pot, which is the example.‚ÄùüîΩLikewise, ‚ÄúIt is impermanent because it arises immediately after effort, unlike space, which is the example.‚Äù

original: dper byas pa'i mi mthun phyogs bum pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid las lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dper byas pa'i mi mthun phyogs bum pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid las lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: In the case of making ‚Äúnot being an embodied thing‚Äù the dissimilar property, it becomes permanent because it is not an embodied thing, unlike a pot, which is the dissimilar property of the example.

original: yang ci'i phyir thun mong pa'i ma nges pa ltar snang ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir thun mong pa'i ma nges pa ltar snang ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why is it a common inconclusive pseudo-reason? It is said:

original: snga ma'i phyogs la ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i phyogs la ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not in the former position.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir ji ltar phyi ma'i phyogs la lus can ma yin pa nyid chos mthun pa nyid dam chos mi mthun pa nyid ma nges pa yin pa de ltar snga ma'i phyogs la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji ltar phyi ma'i phyogs la lus can ma yin pa nyid chos mthun pa nyid dam chos mi mthun pa nyid ma nges pa yin pa de ltar snga ma'i phyogs la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: Because, just as ‚Äúnot being an embodied thing‚Äù is inconclusive as a similar property or dissimilar property in the latter position, in the former position, ‚Äúarising immediately after effort‚Äù is not so.

original: de'i phyir mtshungs pa nyid med pa'i phyir 'di ni thun mong gi ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshungs pa nyid med pa'i phyir 'di ni thun mong gi ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, because of the absence of similarity, this is a seemingly common inconclusive [reason].

original: 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa 'dra //
analyzed: 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa 'dra //
translated: [The third type of inconclusive reason] is like an unmistaken contradictory [reason].

original: zhes pa 'gal pa mi 'khrul ba ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'gal pa mi 'khrul ba ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The meaning of like an unmistaken contradictory [reason] is a seemingly unmistaken contradictory [reason].

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa dang mtshungs par 'jug go zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa dang mtshungs par 'jug go zhes byas nas so //
translated: [The reason] operates similarly to an unmistaken contradictory [reason].

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba ni ma yin te /
translated: [The reason] is not an unmistaken contradictory [reason],

original: lus can ma yin pa nyid ni ma nges pa min pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa nyid ni ma nges pa min pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: because non-embodiment is not inconclusive,

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but not because of immediately arising effort.

original: rjes su 'gro med phyir zhes khyab pa med pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro med phyir zhes khyab pa med pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because of the absence of pervasion means because of the absence of pervasion.

original: yang ci'i phyir rjes 'gro med pa yin zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rjes 'gro med pa yin zhen gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why is there no pervasion? It is stated:

original: ma nges par snang ba gnyis bo dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma nges par snang ba gnyis bo dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The two appearances of inconclusive [reasons]... and so forth.

original: dpe'i tshig gis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyab pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: dpe'i tshig gis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyab pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: By the words of the example, pervasion characterized by concomitance and reverse pervasion should be taught.

original: gzhan du na gtan tshigs la phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na gtan tshigs la phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the reason would not be helpful.

original: chos mthun pa mtshungs pa'am chos mi mthun pa la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag bstan pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: chos mthun pa mtshungs pa'am chos mi mthun pa la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag bstan pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it shown that the similar property or the dissimilar property is pervaded by the presence or absence of the reason.

original: ji ltar phyi ma'i phyogs la yin pa de ltar snga ma'i phyogs la yang ste /
analyzed: ji ltar phyi ma'i phyogs la yin pa de ltar snga ma'i phyogs la yang ste /
translated: Just as it is for the latter position, so it is for the former position.üîΩTherefore, just as our example is faulty, so is yours.

original: des na ji ltar nged kyi dpe skyon can yin pa de ltar khyod kyi yang ngo zhes rtsod par byed pa ni dpe ltar snang bar rtsod par yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na ji ltar nged kyi dpe skyon can yin pa de ltar khyod kyi yang ngo zhes rtsod par byed pa ni dpe ltar snang bar rtsod par yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is also to be applied to the debate over a seemingly similar example.

original: rjes 'gro phyin ci log phyir yang //
analyzed: rjes 'gro phyin ci log phyir yang //
translated: Because of the possibility of a mistaken pervasion,

original: dpe ltar snang pa brjod pa yang //
analyzed: dpe ltar snang pa brjod pa yang //
translated: The statement of a seemingly similar example

original: zhes dkyus ma dang sbrel lo //
analyzed: zhes dkyus ma dang sbrel lo //
translated: Is connected to the main text.

original: yang ci ltar na rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log nyid srid par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log nyid srid par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How can a mistaken pervasion be possible? It is said:

original: bsgrub bya la dpe 'dres pa'i phyir zhes pa 'dres par byed pa ni 'dres pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya la dpe 'dres pa'i phyir zhes pa 'dres par byed pa ni 'dres pa ste /
translated: Because the example is mixed with the probandum. Mixing is being mixed.

original: bsgrub par bya ba chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe dang gcig tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe dang gcig tu byed pa'o //
translated: It is the same as the example of similarity of the property to be established.

original: bum pa ji lta bde ltar sgra'o zhes pa dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar sgra ma yin no zhes /
analyzed: bum pa ji lta bde ltar sgra'o zhes pa dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar sgra ma yin no zhes /
translated: Just as a pot, so is sound, and by dissimilarity also, sound is not like space.

original: nam mkha' dang chos @300a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang chos @300a * //
translated: Space and sound are dissimilar.

original: mthun pa nyid bkag pas bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid kho nar gzhung 'dzugs so //
analyzed: mthun pa nyid bkag pas bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid kho nar gzhung 'dzugs so //
translated: By negating the similarity to space, it is established that sound is similar to a pot.

original: phal cher gyis zhes pa la sogs pas bsre ba'i rang gi ngo bo ston te /
analyzed: phal cher gyis zhes pa la sogs pas bsre ba'i rang gi ngo bo ston te /
translated: By ‚Äúmostly,‚Äù etc., he shows the nature of the mixture.

original: nye bar sbyor ba ni bsre ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba ni bsre ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚Äú Application‚Äù means mixing.

original: gal te de ltar nye bar sbyor bar byed na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar nye bar sbyor bar byed na /
translated: If one applies in this way,

original: de las ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de las ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: what is the point? He says:

original: de la 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that regard, here,‚Äù etc.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: That is so,

original: rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log pa nyid na ni bum pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log pa nyid na ni bum pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra ste /
translated: but if there is a mistaken concomitance, then sound is just like a pot.

original: nam mkha' ji lta ba de bzhin sgra ma yin no zhes pa de ltar nye bar sbyor ba bya bar mi nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji lta ba de bzhin sgra ma yin no zhes pa de ltar nye bar sbyor ba bya bar mi nus pa kho na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSpace is not like sound‚Äù ‚Äî such an application is simply not possible.

original: de'i phyir nye bar sbyor ba bya bar 'dod pas phyin ci log tu rjes su 'gro ba bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar sbyor ba bya bar 'dod pas phyin ci log tu rjes su 'gro ba bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, one who wishes to apply the reason should not do so in a distorted way.

original: des na de ga la srid ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na de ga la srid ce na gsungs pa /
translated: How is that possible?

original: de ltar na yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven so‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar byas pa na yang /üîΩde bzhin du zhes nye par bsdu ba'am /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar byas pa na yang / de bzhin du zhes nye par bsdu ba'am /
translated: Even though one proceeds in that way,üîΩ‚Äúin the same way‚Äù is the application of the reason,

original: de bzhin du ma yin zhes sbyor ba kho na ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma yin zhes sbyor ba kho na ste /
translated: or ‚Äúnot in the same way‚Äù is the application.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: nam mkha' lus can ma yin pa rtag pa de bzhin du sgra ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' lus can ma yin pa rtag pa de bzhin du sgra ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSpace is not embodied and is permanent, and sound is like that.

original: de ltar bum pa lus can mi rtag par mthong ba de bzhin du sgra ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bum pa lus can mi rtag par mthong ba de bzhin du sgra ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as a pot is seen to be embodied and impermanent, sound is not like that.‚Äù

original: de ltar na rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log tu byas pa na yang de bzhin zhes nye bar bsdu ba'ang rigs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log tu byas pa na yang de bzhin zhes nye bar bsdu ba'ang rigs pa kho na'o //
translated: In that way, even when the reason is distorted, ‚Äúin the same way‚Äù is the application.

original: gang las de ltar snang ba nyid du 'gyur ba ci ltar na skyon 'di snga ma'i phyogs la bsgrub bar nus she na /
analyzed: gang las de ltar snang ba nyid du 'gyur ba ci ltar na skyon 'di snga ma'i phyogs la bsgrub bar nus she na /
translated: How could this fault be established in the former position?

original: mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ji ltar yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ji ltar yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Because of the similarity, it is said ‚Äújust as‚Äù and so on.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i phyogs dag mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i phyogs dag mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the former and latter positions are similar,

original: ji ltar phyi ma'i phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log mtshungs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na rjes 'gro phyin ci log nyid du rtsod pa ni dpe ltar snang bar rtsod par yang 'thad do //
analyzed: ji ltar phyi ma'i phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log mtshungs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na rjes 'gro phyin ci log nyid du rtsod pa ni dpe ltar snang bar rtsod par yang 'thad do //
translated: just as it follows that there is a similarity of erroneous concomitance in the latter position, it is also tenable to argue that the concomitance is erroneous.

original: 'di kho na gsal bar byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di kho na gsal bar byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: This is stated to clarify just that:

original: gang gi phyir dpe ston pa tsam ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dpe ston pa tsam ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because of the mere indication of the example.

original: 'jig rten pa rnams kyis ni ji srid tsam du dper bstan pa bum pa la sogs pa de srid tsam dpe nyid du 'dod de /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams kyis ni ji srid tsam du dper bstan pa bum pa la sogs pa de srid tsam dpe nyid du 'dod de /
translated: As long as worldly people indicate the example, such as a pot, just that is asserted as the example.

original: de'i phyir de srid tsam dpe nyid yin na snga ma dang phyi ma'i phyogs dag rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log tu mtshungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de srid tsam dpe nyid yin na snga ma dang phyi ma'i phyogs dag rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log tu mtshungs so //
translated: Therefore, if that mere possibility is the example, then the former and latter positions are equally erroneous with respect to the entailment.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩgang gi phyir phyogs snga ma la ji ltar bum pa chos gnyis dang ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o // gang gi phyir phyogs snga ma la ji ltar bum pa chos gnyis dang ste /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause it is like this . . .‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can dang @300b ldan pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i phyogs la yang nam mkha' lus can ma yin pa nyid dang rtag pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos gnyis dang do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can dang @300b ldan pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i phyogs la yang nam mkha' lus can ma yin pa nyid dang rtag pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos gnyis dang do //
translated: Because, just as in the former position, the pot is endowed with two properties‚Äîthat is, the property to be proven and the proving property‚Äîin the same way, in the latter position, space is also endowed with two properties‚Äîthat is, the property of being nonphysical and the property of being permanent.

original: lhan cig gyur pa yang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa dag dpes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: lhan cig gyur pa yang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa dag dpes bstan par bya'o //
translated: The two, the property to be proven and the proving property, are also together taught by the example.

original: de yang rjes su 'gro pa phyin ci log la yang dper byas pa bum pa la sogs pa la rab tu ston par nus pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang rjes su 'gro pa phyin ci log la yang dper byas pa bum pa la sogs pa la rab tu ston par nus pa kho na ste /
translated: And that is also able to be shown in the example of the pot, etc., where the entailment is erroneous.

original: de'i phyir dpe ltar snang bar rtsod par 'thad do zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe ltar snang bar rtsod par 'thad do zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to dispute that the example is similar.

original: 'o na ji ltar ltag chod smra ba pos sbyor bas gtan tshigs kyi med na mi 'byung pa nyid nye bar mi ston pa de ltar phyogs snga ma smra ba pos kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar ltag chod smra ba pos sbyor bas gtan tshigs kyi med na mi 'byung pa nyid nye bar mi ston pa de ltar phyogs snga ma smra ba pos kyang ngo //
translated: Well, just as the proponent of the reductio does not demonstrate the pervasion of the reason, so too the opponent does not demonstrate it.

original: de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i dor sun 'byin pa kho nar 'di dag rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i dor sun 'byin pa kho nar 'di dag rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is only proper to refute them by rejecting the worldly usage of the syllogism.

original: yongs su gnas par mtshungs pa'i phyir ngo //
analyzed: yongs su gnas par mtshungs pa'i phyir ngo //
translated: Because the two are similar in being equally non-established.

original: des na ci'i phyir sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci'i phyir sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Why then are they called ‚Äúpseudo-refutations‚Äù?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: To answer this, he says:

original: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is also the case with the other.‚Äù

original: 'di skad ston par byed de /
analyzed: 'di skad ston par byed de /
translated: This is what he is saying.

original: ji skad smras pa 'di bden mod /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa 'di bden mod /
translated: It is true that what he says is so.

original: de lta na yang nges pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs la ma nges pa nyid kyis dong zlar gnas pa mi rigs so zhes pa 'di tsam kho nas gnyis po 'di lan ltar snang ba nyid du bshad do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang nges pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs la ma nges pa nyid kyis dong zlar gnas pa mi rigs so zhes pa 'di tsam kho nas gnyis po 'di lan ltar snang ba nyid du bshad do zhes pa'o //
translated: In that case, it is not right that the very reason for certainty should stand as a counter-example by way of uncertainty. Just this much is explained as the mere semblance of an answer to the two.

original: de bdag nyid de nges pa pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bdag nyid de nges pa pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: That nature is the nature of certainty.

original: de las tha dad pa ni bzlog pa nyid kyis te ma nges pa nyid kyis zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de las tha dad pa ni bzlog pa nyid kyis te ma nges pa nyid kyis zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Different from that is the opposite, by way of uncertainty.

original: rgyu des gnyis ka 'khrul bar snang ba yin par brjod do //
analyzed: rgyu des gnyis ka 'khrul bar snang ba yin par brjod do //
translated: By that reason, both are said to appear as mistaken.

original: sbyor ba snga ma gtan tshigs ni //
analyzed: sbyor ba snga ma gtan tshigs ni //
translated: The former application is the reason.

original: nges pa ba nyid byas pa med //
analyzed: nges pa ba nyid byas pa med //
translated: The certainty is not made.

original: ces pa nges pa pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa nges pa pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not taught as the certainty.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su 'jug pas ni zhes pa gang las 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba kho na la de dag gi skabs yin par 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i ngor byas pas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su 'jug pas ni zhes pa gang las 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba kho na la de dag gi skabs yin par 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i ngor byas pas so //
translated: By following the worldly application, by the perspective of the worldly application, it is made that the occasion of those is only in the worldly application.

original: nged kyi sbyor pa la ni ma yin te //
analyzed: nged kyi sbyor pa la ni ma yin te //
translated: But not in our syllogism,

original: de la nges pa pa nyid du bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la nges pa pa nyid du bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it has been shown to be certain.

original: ci la bsams nas 'di ma nges pa ltar snang bar brjod ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci la bsams nas 'di ma nges pa ltar snang bar brjod ce na gsungs pa /
translated: With what in mind is it said that it appears to be uncertain? He says,

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'i gtan tshigs kye zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'i gtan tshigs kye zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe reason is that it arises immediately after effort.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs spyis she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs spyis she na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is the reason a fallacy? He says,

original: phyin ci log gis zhes pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log gis zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of error.‚Äù

original: phyin ci log pa nyid kyang /
analyzed: phyin ci log pa nyid kyang /
translated: And error is

original: nges pa'i ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: nges pa'i ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: uncertain certainty.

original: 'dis ni de'i bdag las tha dad pas zhes pa 'di'i don nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni de'i bdag las tha dad pas zhes pa 'di'i don nye bar bstan to //
translated: This shows the meaning of ‚Äúbecause of its difference from it.‚Äù

original: ji ltar kho bo cag gi sbyor ba de ltar sbyor ba bya ba na ni zhes pa'i don to //üîΩchos mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa la sogs @301a * //
analyzed: ji ltar kho bo cag gi sbyor ba de ltar sbyor ba bya ba na ni zhes pa'i don to // chos mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa la sogs @301a * //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúwhen one acts in syllogizing as we do‚Äù is this.üîΩThe similarity of the property-possessor, etc.,

original: ba rnams zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras chos mi mthun pa nyid dang rnam par rtog pa dang khyad par mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba rnams zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras chos mi mthun pa nyid dang rnam par rtog pa dang khyad par mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes dissimilarity, doubt, and the similarity of the distinction, etc.

original: ma 'brel pa rnams kho na'o zhes pa de skyed par byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //üîΩchos mthun nyid la'ang khyad par brjod //
analyzed: ma 'brel pa rnams kho na'o zhes pa de skyed par byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro // chos mthun nyid la'ang khyad par brjod //
translated: because it is impossible for that which is not related to be a producer.

original: ces pa mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ces pa mtshan nyid do //
translated: The definition of a reductio is:üîΩA reductio is the expression of a contradictionüîΩin the opponent‚Äôs thesis through the use of what he accepts.

original: chos mthun pa nyid la khyad par brjod pa yang ltag chod de /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid la khyad par brjod pa yang ltag chod de /
translated: The expression of a contradiction in the opponent‚Äôs thesis through the use of what he accepts is a reductio.

original: phrad dang ma phrad mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams su ma zad ces pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
analyzed: phrad dang ma phrad mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams su ma zad ces pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is that it is not only the ‚Äúmeeting and not meeting‚Äù and so on that are reductios.

original: rnam rtog mtshungs yin zhes pa mtshon bya'o //üîΩsnga ma bzhin la bum pa chos mthun pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid du byas pa la zhes pa dam bcas pa na'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog mtshungs yin zhes pa mtshon bya'o // snga ma bzhin la bum pa chos mthun pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid du byas pa la zhes pa dam bcas pa na'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe conceptual distinction is the same‚Äù is the example.üîΩThe expression ‚Äújust as impermanence is established by the property of the sound being a product‚Äù is the thesis.

original: 'di lta ste sgra mi rtag ste brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes pa la ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa /
analyzed: 'di lta ste sgra mi rtag ste brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes pa la ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa /
translated: The expression ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because it arises from effort, just like a pot‚Äù is the statement of the reductio by the proponent of the reductio.

original: 'di la chos mthun pa nyid yod na /
analyzed: 'di la chos mthun pa nyid yod na /
translated: The expression ‚ÄúIf there were a property common to both‚Äù is the statement of the opponent‚Äôs acceptance.

original: bum pa kho na tshos par bya ba dang mig gis gzung bar bya bas te /
analyzed: bum pa kho na tshos par bya ba dang mig gis gzung bar bya bas te /
translated: The expression ‚ÄúThe pot alone is to be burned and is to be grasped by the eye‚Äù is the statement of the contradiction.

original: des na bum pa kho na mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir dang tshos par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yang mi rtag par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: des na bum pa kho na mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir dang tshos par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yang mi rtag par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, because only a vase is seen by the eye and is also burned, it is impermanent.

original: sgra ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni ma yin te /
translated: But sound is not.

original: sgra kho na mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa dang tshos par bya ba ma yin pa dang mnyan par bya ba yin gyi bum pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra kho na mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa dang tshos par bya ba ma yin pa dang mnyan par bya ba yin gyi bum pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Only sound is not seen by the eye, is not burned, and is heard, but a vase is not.

original: des na sgra kho na mig gis gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir rtag bar 'gyur gyi bum pa ni ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: des na sgra kho na mig gis gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir rtag bar 'gyur gyi bum pa ni ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: Therefore, only sound is permanent because it is not seen by the eye and so on, but a vase is not.

original: gang bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: gang bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa ste /
translated: The probandum is impermanence.

original: de las bzlog pa rtag pa nyid du rtogs pa ni rnam rtog mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa rtag pa nyid du rtogs pa ni rnam rtog mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The understanding of the opposite of that, permanence, is a similar conception.

original: dpe brjod las gzhan pa yang zhes pa /
analyzed: dpe brjod las gzhan pa yang zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúOther than the example‚Äù is stated.

original: dpe brjod ni bum pa ste /
analyzed: dpe brjod ni bum pa ste /
translated: The example is a vase.

original: de las gzhan kham phor la sogs pa la yang dang chu la sogs pa la yang byas pa nyid du mtshungs pa la ji ltar tshos par bya ba dang tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi bye brag mthong ba de ltar sgra dang bum pa dag
analyzed: de las gzhan kham phor la sogs pa la yang dang chu la sogs pa la yang byas pa nyid du mtshungs pa la ji ltar tshos par bya ba dang tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi bye brag mthong ba de ltar sgra dang bum pa dag
translated: In the same way, sound and pot,

original: la yang byas pa nyid dang chos mthun pa nyid yod na yang rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: la yang byas pa nyid dang chos mthun pa nyid yod na yang rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par du 'gyur ro //
translated: even though they have the similarity of being produced, will have the difference of being permanent and impermanent.

original: 'khrul pa can gyi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: 'khrul pa can gyi khyad par gyis //
translated: By the difference of the mistaken

original: zhes pa tshos pa ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa tshos pa ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: By not being cooked.

original: de ni bum pa las sgra'i khyad par du 'gyur zhing 'khrul pa can yang ste /
analyzed: de ni bum pa las sgra'i khyad par du 'gyur zhing 'khrul pa can yang ste /
translated: That is the difference of sound from pot, and it is also mistaken,

original: mi rtag pa las gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa las gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists in other things besides impermanence.üîΩBy the uncommon

original: spyi min gyis kyang zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa mnyan par bya ba nyid la sogs pas so //
analyzed: spyi min gyis kyang zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa mnyan par bya ba nyid la sogs pas so //
translated: By the uncommon, such as being heard.

original: rtag par thal phyir de snang nyid //
analyzed: rtag par thal phyir de snang nyid //
translated: Because of the consequence of permanence, it is appearance itself.

original: ces pa gnyis ka la sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa gnyis ka la sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: Both are to be connected.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /üîΩchos par bya ba ma @301b yin pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis sam /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te / chos par bya ba ma @301b yin pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis sam /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid la sogs pa thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyis mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar byed pa'i phyir de ltar snang ba nyid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid la sogs pa thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyis mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar byed pa'i phyir de ltar snang ba nyid do zhes pa'o //
translated: Because of the distinction of being a phenomenon that is not to be heard and so on, or because of the uncommon property of being that which is to be heard and so on, impermanence is entailed.üîΩTherefore it is just as we have explained.

original: rang gi phyogs lam grub ba bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ni snga ma'i phyogs la yang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa'i chos nyid du sgro btags nas so sor gnas te /
analyzed: rang gi phyogs lam grub ba bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ni snga ma'i phyogs la yang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa'i chos nyid du sgro btags nas so sor gnas te /
translated: With respect to the line ‚ÄúJust as one‚Äôs own position is established,‚Äù and so on, the opponent‚Äôs position is that the property of being impermanent is not established by the common and uncommon properties that are superimposed on the subject.

original: ji ltar nged kyi 'khrul pa can gyi thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos dag gis rtag pa nyid 'grub pa med pa de ltar khyod kyi yang zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar nged kyi 'khrul pa can gyi thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos dag gis rtag pa nyid 'grub pa med pa de ltar khyod kyi yang zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as our properties of being mistaken and so on do not establish the subject as permanent, so too your properties of being impermanent and so on do not establish the subject as impermanent.

original: de ltar rang gi phyogs ma grub pa bzhin du pha rol la ma grub par ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi phyogs ma grub pa bzhin du pha rol la ma grub par ston pa'i phyir /
translated: In this way, just as one‚Äôs own position is not established, so too the opponent‚Äôs position is not established.

original: sun 'byin par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: sun 'byin par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: So how can you refute us?

original: sgrub par byed par yin /
analyzed: sgrub par byed par yin /
translated: The proof is the is-ness.

original: rang gi phyogs kyi zhes brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs kyi zhes brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate one‚Äôs own position.

original: sgrub byed yin na 'gal ba dang ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o zhes pa /
analyzed: sgrub byed yin na 'gal ba dang ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o zhes pa /
translated: If it is a proof, it is contradictory and uncertain, like the appearance.

original: gal te tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa rang gi phyogs 'grub pa'i don kho nar rab tu sbyor na /
analyzed: gal te tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa rang gi phyogs 'grub pa'i don kho nar rab tu sbyor na /
translated: If one employs the non-cook, etc. only for the purpose of establishing one‚Äôs own position,

original: de las 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can ltar snang ba nyid de /
analyzed: de las 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can ltar snang ba nyid de /
translated: then it is like the appearance of an unmistaken contradiction.

original: stobs mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not equal in strength.

original: gzhan du na yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: gzhan du na yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: Also, in another case, etc.

original: ji ltar rdzas ma yin pa dang las ma yin ba'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rdzas ma yin pa dang las ma yin ba'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: It is like the sound that is not a substance and is not an action.

original: mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid yod na /
analyzed: mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid yod na /
translated: If there is non-apprehension by the eye,

original: mngon sum nyid las zhes pa /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid las zhes pa /
translated: then it is from direct perception.

original: mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang lhan cig pa kho na'i mngon sum nyid ni gtan tshigs nyid do //
analyzed: mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang lhan cig pa kho na'i mngon sum nyid ni gtan tshigs nyid do //
translated: Direct perception itself, which is only concomitant with non-apprehension by the eye, is the reason.

original: de ltar tshos par bya ba nyid la sogs pa lhan cig pa kho na'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni gtan tshigs nyid yin gyi /üîΩ'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar tshos par bya ba nyid la sogs pa lhan cig pa kho na'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni gtan tshigs nyid yin gyi / 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.

original: mngon sum nyid bzhin du 'khrul pa can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa de ltar gal te tshos par bya ba nyid la sogs pa dang bcas pa gtan tshigs nyid smra na /üîΩde'i tshe rnam pa 'dis kyang ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //üîΩci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /üîΩ'ba' zhig pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩmngon sum nyid dang mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dag gi 'ba' zhig pa dag gtan tshigs nyid ma yin gyi lhan cig pa nyid dag kho na gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid bzhin du 'khrul pa can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa de ltar gal te tshos par bya ba nyid la sogs pa dang bcas pa gtan tshigs nyid smra na / de'i tshe rnam pa 'dis kyang ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o // ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa / 'ba' zhig pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste / mngon sum nyid dang mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dag gi 'ba' zhig pa dag gtan tshigs nyid ma yin gyi lhan cig pa nyid dag kho na gtan tshigs so //
translated: But not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.üîΩBut not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni 'ba' zhig pa yang gtan tshigs nyid do zhes pa tshogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni 'ba' zhig pa yang gtan tshigs nyid do zhes pa tshogs pa'i don to //
translated: But not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc., and the mere fact of arising immediately after the effort are the reason.

original: gcig nyid du /
analyzed: gcig nyid du /
translated: But not the mere fact of being simultaneous with the object of cooking, etc.,

original: thal phyir khyad par med par byed //
analyzed: thal phyir khyad par med par byed //
translated: and the reason is not different from the example.

original: ces pa mtshan nyid do //üîΩbsgrub par bya ba dang dpe'i chos can dag / mi rtag @302a * //
analyzed: ces pa mtshan nyid do // bsgrub par bya ba dang dpe'i chos can dag / mi rtag @302a * //
translated: This is the definition.

original: pa nyid la sogs par chos mthun pa nyid kyis gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: pa nyid la sogs par chos mthun pa nyid kyis gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: The probandum and the example-subject are identical because of the similarity of their properties, such as impermanence, etc.

original: gtan tshigs chos gzhan rnams kyis kyang gang gcig nyid du byed pa de ni khyad par med pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs chos gzhan rnams kyis kyang gang gcig nyid du byed pa de ni khyad par med pa byed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the reason is not different from the other properties.

original: mdo 'dir 'di dang lhan cig 'di'i khyad par med pa'o zhes ma brjod ces pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: mdo 'dir 'di dang lhan cig 'di'i khyad par med pa'o zhes ma brjod ces pa de'i phyir /
translated: In this s≈´tra, it is not stated that ‚Äúthis is without distinction from that.‚Äù

original: ci zhig ni ci zhig dang lhan cig khyad par med pa'o zhes mi shes zhes pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: ci zhig ni ci zhig dang lhan cig khyad par med pa'o zhes mi shes zhes pa de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, it is not known what is without distinction from what.

original: de yongs su shes pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yongs su shes pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to understand that, it is stated:

original: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dper byas pa'i skabs nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dper byas pa'i skabs nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the context of the example of similarity, etc.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa la ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa la ni /
translated: In the case of a similar conception,

original: chos mthun nyid la'ang khyad par brjod //
analyzed: chos mthun nyid la'ang khyad par brjod //
translated: the similarity is also expressed as a distinction.

original: ces pa'i tshig las chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i skabs so //
analyzed: ces pa'i tshig las chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i skabs so //
translated: This is the example of similarity of attributes in the verse.

original: gang phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni sgra'i chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe bum pa la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni sgra'i chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe bum pa la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa nyid de /
translated: Because it arises immediately upon effort, sound is similar to a pot, etc., in the attribute of similarity.

original: gzhan dang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not similar to anything else.

original: de lta na yang mi zhig dang lhan cig ci zhig gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba mi shes so zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang mi zhig dang lhan cig ci zhig gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba mi shes so zhe na /
translated: Even so, one does not understand what is meant by the consequence of identity with someone.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: dod zlar sbyor ba'i mnyan pa med pa'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dod zlar sbyor ba'i mnyan pa med pa'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because there is no hearer to apply the equivalent.

original: bsgrub par bya ba las gzhan ni 'dir re zhig dod zlar sbyor ba nyid du rtogs par byar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba las gzhan ni 'dir re zhig dod zlar sbyor ba nyid du rtogs par byar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, something other than the probandum cannot be understood as capable of applying the equivalent.

original: de ma thos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma thos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not heard.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyang skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir nye ba nyid de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyang skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir nye ba nyid de /
translated: The probandum itself is the context, so it is close.

original: de'i phyir de'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood as ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur zhes pa du ma'i don can nyid kyi phyir byed pa ni 'dir thal bar 'gyur ba'i don du rnam par shes par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur zhes pa du ma'i don can nyid kyi phyir byed pa ni 'dir thal bar 'gyur ba'i don du rnam par shes par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit follows that there is no difference‚Äù is that it follows that there is no difference between the subject and the example.

original: de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can ni /
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can ni /
translated: Thus, the subject to be provenüîΩis the same as the example that has the same property.

original: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe dang gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur bar byed pa ni khyad par med pa mtshungs pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe dang gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur bar byed pa ni khyad par med pa mtshungs pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of ‚Äúit follows that there is no difference‚Äù is that it follows that there is no difference between the subject and the example.

original: ci zhig gi ci zhig dang lhan cig khyad par med ces pa /üîΩci bum pa kho na dang sgra khyad par med dam /
analyzed: ci zhig gi ci zhig dang lhan cig khyad par med ces pa / ci bum pa kho na dang sgra khyad par med dam /
translated: What is the same as what?

original: 'on te snam bu la sogs pa gzhan dang yang yin /üîΩyang na ci bum pa'i chos gcig dang sgra khyad par med pa'am /
analyzed: 'on te snam bu la sogs pa gzhan dang yang yin / yang na ci bum pa'i chos gcig dang sgra khyad par med pa'am /
translated: Is it the same as the sound, or is it the same as the other, such as the cloth?üîΩOr is it the same as one property of the vase, or is it the same as all the properties of the vase?

original: 'on te bum pa'i chos rnams thams cad dang yin zhes pa 'di'i phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: 'on te bum pa'i chos rnams thams cad dang yin zhes pa 'di'i phyir gsungs pa //
translated: In order to explain this, he said:

original: byad par du ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad kyi thams cad dang ngo zhes pa /
analyzed: byad par du ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad kyi thams cad dang ngo zhes pa /
translated: Because it is not made into a variety of images, it is all of all.

original: 'dir khyad par nye bar blangs pa cung zad kyang med @302b de de'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi chos rnams thams cad dang / phan tshun khyad par med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir khyad par nye bar blangs pa cung zad kyang med @302b de de'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi chos rnams thams cad dang / phan tshun khyad par med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here there is not the slightest particularity that is taken up. Therefore, all phenomena of all things should be known to be without mutual difference.

original: gal te bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid mthong ba las gzhan yang khyad par med par bya na zhes pa 'dis de'i lugs la ha cang thal ba ston par byed de /
analyzed: gal te bum pa dang chos mthun pa nyid mthong ba las gzhan yang khyad par med par bya na zhes pa 'dis de'i lugs la ha cang thal ba ston par byed de /
translated: If, seeing the similarity of a pot, one makes it without difference from another, this shows the absurd consequence in his system.

original: gang gi dbang gis khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ba'o //üîΩbum pa'i chos thams cad ces ba la sogs pas de khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi dbang gis khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ba'o // bum pa'i chos thams cad ces ba la sogs pas de khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By whose power would it follow that there is no difference?üîΩBy all the phenomena of a pot, etc.

original: thams cad kyi phan tshun chos mthun pa nyid las zhes pa gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa las 'gro ba thams cad gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi phan tshun chos mthun pa nyid las zhes pa gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa las 'gro ba thams cad gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: From the similarity of all things, it follows that all beings are the same, because of being objects of knowledge, etc.

original: khyad par med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di khyad par med par mtshungs pa'o //üîΩshin tu tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes pa ni rnam rtog mtshungs pa la ni dngos su khyad par ston cing /
analyzed: khyad par med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di khyad par med par mtshungs pa'o // shin tu tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes pa ni rnam rtog mtshungs pa la ni dngos su khyad par ston cing /
translated: It follows that there would be no difference. This is the same as the previous argument.üîΩ‚ÄúNot at all different‚Äù is a different application of the same idea.

original: 'dir ni khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas so zhes pa sbyor ba tsam tha dad kyi don ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas so zhes pa sbyor ba tsam tha dad kyi don ni ma yin no //
translated: In the previous argument, the difference was shown directly; here, the difference is shown by the consequence that there would be no difference.

original: de'i phyir shin tu tha dad pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir shin tu tha dad pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNot at all different‚Äù means that the two are not different in reality.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin du ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //üîΩshin tu yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin du ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o // shin tu yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: Therefore, it is just as uncertain as the previous argument.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid kyang gnyis ka shin tu yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid kyang gnyis ka shin tu yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause they do not exist at all‚Äù means that both ‚Äúarising immediately after being sought‚Äù and ‚Äúimpermanence‚Äù do not exist at all.

original: de ltar ni brtsal ma thag tu skye ba nyid ni brtsal ma thag tu 'byung pa nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar ni brtsal ma thag tu skye ba nyid ni brtsal ma thag tu 'byung pa nyid de /
translated: ‚ÄúArising immediately after being sought‚Äù means arising immediately after being sought.

original: de yang shin tu yod pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang shin tu yod pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: That also does not exist at all.

original: rtsol ba las sngar med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsol ba las sngar med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not exist prior to effort.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyang gtan nas yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyang gtan nas yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Impermanence also does not exist at all.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag tha dad med pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs so zhes pas ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag tha dad med pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs so zhes pas ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because the probandum and the proof are not different, the statement ‚ÄúOne part of the meaning of the thesis is the reason‚Äù is unestablished.

original: 'di yang ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: 'di yang ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
translated: This is also a pseudo-nonestablishment.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why? It is said:

original: skye ba las sngar med pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: skye ba las sngar med pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it does not exist prior to arising, etc.‚Äù

original: / skye ba las sngar med pa gang gi yin pa de skye ba las sngar med pa'o //
analyzed: / skye ba las sngar med pa gang gi yin pa de skye ba las sngar med pa'o //
translated: That which does not exist prior to arising is ‚Äúthat which does not exist prior to arising.‚Äù

original: yang de ci zhe na skabs nyid kyi phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba ste /
analyzed: yang de ci zhe na skabs nyid kyi phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba ste /
translated: Moreover, what is that? Because of the context, it is that which arises immediately after effort.

original: de ni rtsol ba las sngar skye ba med pa'o zhes pa 'di ni rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rtsol ba las sngar skye ba med pa'o zhes pa 'di ni rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: That is ‚Äúthat which does not exist prior to arising from effort.‚Äù This is well known.

original: de bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin nyid du sgro btags nas bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag khyad par med par thal bar byed pa'i phyir 'di ni ma grub par ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin nyid du sgro btags nas bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag khyad par med par thal bar byed pa'i phyir 'di ni ma grub par ltar snang ba'o //
translated: because it is the nature of the probandum that is imputed, and it would follow, absurdly, that the probandum and the proof would be indistinguishable.

original: skye ba las sngar med ba yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du sgro btags pas bsgrub bya'i chos las tha dad par ston to //
analyzed: skye ba las sngar med ba yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du sgro btags pas bsgrub bya'i chos las tha dad par ston to //
translated: The nonexistence prior to arising is also imputed to be the probandum, and so it is shown to be different from the property to be proven.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos ni mi rtag pa nyid de /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos ni mi rtag pa nyid de /
translated: The property to be proven is impermanence.

original: snga ma'i gnas skabs las khyad par du byung ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i gnas skabs las khyad par du byung ba'o //
translated: It is a state that is different from the previous state.

original: @303a * // rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni brtsal ma thag tu skye ba'am mngon par gsal ba shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos gzhan kho na'o //
analyzed: @303a * // rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni brtsal ma thag tu skye ba'am mngon par gsal ba shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos gzhan kho na'o //
translated: The arising that occurs immediately after effort is a different property altogether, whose defining characteristic is the arising or manifestation of that which is produced immediately after effort.

original: 'dir ni de grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir ni de grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, since that is already established, it is not the probandum.

original: 'o na ci zhe na grub pa des mi rtag pa nyid du ste /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na grub pa des mi rtag pa nyid du ste /
translated: What is it then? It is impermanence, which is established by that.

original: zhig nas med pa'i rnam grangs can gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: zhig nas med pa'i rnam grangs can gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The self that is the nature of a particular state is a nominal existent, because it is destroyed and does not exist.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: grub pa yis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩmi rtag pa bzhin du chos gzhan sgrub par byed pa yang zhes pa /
analyzed: grub pa yis zhes pa la sogs pa'o // mi rtag pa bzhin du chos gzhan sgrub par byed pa yang zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThe established, etc.‚ÄùüîΩJust as impermanence is established, so too is the other property to be established, because it is seen to occur immediately after effort.üîΩJust as impermanence is established, so too is the other property to be established, because it is seen to occur immediately after effort.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ji ltar mi rtag pa la mthong ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa de ltar tshos par bya ba nyid la sogs pa bsgrub bya'i khyad par dang 'gal ba chos gzhan yang ste /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ji ltar mi rtag pa la mthong ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa de ltar tshos par bya ba nyid la sogs pa bsgrub bya'i khyad par dang 'gal ba chos gzhan yang ste /
translated: The property to be established is the particular property, such as the state of being a product. The other property is the property that is contradictory to the particular property to be established.

original: de dang ldan pa bum pa la sogs pa la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa bum pa la sogs pa la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen in a vase, etc. that possesses that.

original: de las kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos kyi chos dag gi sgrub par byed pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos kyi chos dag gi sgrub par byed pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o //
translated: And because there is no distinction between the property to be established and the other property in terms of being the means of establishment, there is no distinction.

original: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gnod par byed pa ni bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa ste 'gal ba'i chos so //üîΩde'i sgrub par byed pa ni bsgrub bya la gnod par byed pa sgrub par byed ba ste /
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gnod par byed pa ni bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa ste 'gal ba'i chos so // de'i sgrub par byed pa ni bsgrub bya la gnod par byed pa sgrub par byed ba ste /
translated: The word also in the line and also and so on refers to the refutation of the property to be established. The refutation of the property to be established is the contradictory property.üîΩThe proof of that is the proof of the refutation of the property to be established.

original: de'i dngos po ni bsgrub bya la gnod par byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni bsgrub bya la gnod par byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of that is the very proof of the refutation of the property to be established.

original: 'dir ni der rtsod pa la bsgrub bya la gnod par byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi sgra blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni der rtsod pa la bsgrub bya la gnod par byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi sgra blta bar bya ste /
translated: Here, in the dispute over that, the word proof should be understood to refer to the very proof of the refutation of the property to be established.

original: 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs su rtsod par byed pa nyid kyis na 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs su rtsod par byed pa nyid kyis na 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a seeming contradiction because it is a dispute over a contradictory reason.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: tshos par bya ba la sogs pa rnams la nges pa las zhes pa /
analyzed: tshos par bya ba la sogs pa rnams la nges pa las zhes pa /
translated: From the ascertainment of the object to be established and so on.

original: ji ltar rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni nges pa nyid de de ltar tshos pa la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni nges pa nyid de de ltar tshos pa la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: Just as in the proof of permanence, the property of the subject, ‚Äúarising immediately upon exertion,‚Äù is ascertained in the same way in the case of ‚Äúbeing cooked‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, this is a fallacious reason that appears to be correct.
