original: bshad pa yang zhes de ma thag tu bshad pa'i don tshigs su bcad pas sdud do //üîΩbsgrub bya gnod byed chos la yang //
analyzed: bshad pa yang zhes de ma thag tu bshad pa'i don tshigs su bcad pas sdud do // bsgrub bya gnod byed chos la yang //
translated: The verse summarizes the meaning of the immediately preceding explanation.üîΩThe reason is the same

original: mtshungs pa nyid kyis khyad med byed //
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid kyis khyad med byed //
translated: with respect to the property to be proven.

original: rtsod pa la'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //üîΩbsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa'i chos la mtshungs pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyis khyad par med par byed de thal bar 'gyur bar byed /
analyzed: rtsod pa la'o zhes pa lhag ma'o // bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa'i chos la mtshungs pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyis khyad par med par byed de thal bar 'gyur bar byed /
translated: The remainder is ‚Äúin a debate.‚ÄùüîΩThe reason is the same with respect to the property to be proven that is harmed by the property of the subject. The reason makes no distinction, that is, it is inconclusive.

original: gtan tshigs la rtsod pa gang yin pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs la rtsod pa gang yin pa /
translated: The reason is the same with respect to the property to be proven that is harmed by the property of the subject. The reason makes no distinction, that is, it is inconclusive.

original: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'di 'dod pa'i chos la sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa de ltar @303b bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa la yang ngo zhes pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa can de ni gtan tshigs skyon la 'gal bar snang ba'i khyad par
analyzed: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'di 'dod pa'i chos la sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa de ltar @303b bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa la yang ngo zhes pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa can de ni gtan tshigs skyon la 'gal bar snang ba'i khyad par
translated: This is the kind of reason that appears to be contradictory to the fault of the reason.

original: med pa mtshungs pa'i ltag chod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa mtshungs pa'i ltag chod du 'gyur ro //
translated: This is a futile rejoinder that is similar to the reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs khyad par med pa 'ba' zhig las yin par ma zad kyi 'o na ci zhe na rnam pa 'dis kyang ngo zhes gsal bar bya ba'i ched du yang gi sgra'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs khyad par med pa 'ba' zhig las yin par ma zad kyi 'o na ci zhe na rnam pa 'dis kyang ngo zhes gsal bar bya ba'i ched du yang gi sgra'o //
translated: Not only is it from the mere non-difference of the probandum and the reason, but also by this aspect. The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is for the purpose of clarifying this.

original: skyon med na ni gtan tshigs la rtsod pa /
analyzed: skyon med na ni gtan tshigs la rtsod pa /
translated: If there is no fault, there is a dispute about the reason.

original: de sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
analyzed: de sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse: ‚ÄúIt is refuted.‚Äù

original: yang ci chos mthun pa nyid dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa dang khyad par med pa mtshungs pa 'di rnams thams cad du lan ltar snang ba rnams kho nar 'gyur ram 'on te 'ba' zhig tu lan rnams su yang yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci chos mthun pa nyid dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa dang khyad par med pa mtshungs pa 'di rnams thams cad du lan ltar snang ba rnams kho nar 'gyur ram 'on te 'ba' zhig tu lan rnams su yang yin zhe na /
translated: Again, are these all just similar responses, without any difference in terms of similarity of Dharma, dissimilarity of Dharma, and conceptualization? Or are they also just responses?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: lan rnams 'gyur zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lan rnams 'gyur zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The responses are... and so on.

original: mtha' gcig tu nges pa dang ldan pa'i snga ma'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: mtha' gcig tu nges pa dang ldan pa'i snga ma'i phyogs la'o //
translated: In the former position, which is definite in one way...

original: gal te 'di rnams mtha' gcig pa rnams kyis so sor gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'di rnams mtha' gcig pa rnams kyis so sor gnas par gyur na /
translated: If these were to remain individually in one way,

original: de'i tshe 'di rnams sun 'byin pa kho na rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di rnams sun 'byin pa kho na rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: then they would only be refutations at that time.

original: so sor gnas pa mtshungs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: so sor gnas pa mtshungs pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because of the similarity in remaining individually,

original: de ltar snang ba rnams su ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba rnams su ma yin no //
translated: they are not just appearances.

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang lan rnams su 'gyur bar ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang lan rnams su 'gyur bar ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: In another way, it is said that the responses are:

original: phyogs snga ma la yang ma nges pa nyid dang ldan na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs snga ma la yang ma nges pa nyid dang ldan na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Even in the former position, which has uncertainty... and so on.

original: ma nges pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs snga ma la /
analyzed: ma nges pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs snga ma la /
translated: In regard to the former position that possesses indeterminacy,

original: gal te de skad brjod pa'i 'khrul pa chos mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa la sogs pa dang dod zlar gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de skad brjod pa'i 'khrul pa chos mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa la sogs pa dang dod zlar gnas par gyur na /
translated: if the fault of such expression abides as a counter-correlate of the similarity of the same property,

original: de lta na yang de sun 'byin pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang de sun 'byin pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: then, in that case, it would be a refutation.

original: 'di nyid sten te /
analyzed: 'di nyid sten te /
translated: This very thing is relied upon.

original: de'i phyir sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas sam zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas sam zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúby way of refutation‚Äù and so forth.

original: de la chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa dag la ni ma nges pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs snga ma la ma nges pa dang ldan pa kho nas dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa dag la ni ma nges pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs snga ma la ma nges pa dang ldan pa kho nas dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: In regard to that, in the case of the similarity of the same property and the similarity of a different property, since the former position that possesses indeterminacy abides as a counter-correlate only by way of possessing indeterminacy,

original: sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas thun mong gi ma nges par rtsod pa'i phyir dang / mtha' gcig pa dang ldan pa la mtha' gcig pas dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba dang ma nges par rtsod pa las so //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas thun mong gi ma nges par rtsod pa'i phyir dang / mtha' gcig pa dang ldan pa la mtha' gcig pas dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba dang ma nges par rtsod pa las so //
translated: it is because of the dispute of common indeterminacy by way of refutation and because of the abiding as a counter-correlate of the one-sided by way of the one-sided, that it is from the dispute of the contradictory and the indeterminate by way of establishment.

original: rnam rtog mtshungs pa la ni thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa dang phyogs snga ma la /
analyzed: rnam rtog mtshungs pa la ni thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa dang phyogs snga ma la /
translated: In the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.

original: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dag gis dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dag gis dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: In the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.

original: @304a * // sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges par rtsod pa las dang / mtha' gcig pa dang ldan pa la mtha' gcig tu gnas pa ma yin pas dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba dang ma nges par rtsod pa las so //üîΩde bzhin du khyad par med pa mtshungs pa dang po la ste /
analyzed: @304a * // sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges par rtsod pa las dang / mtha' gcig pa dang ldan pa la mtha' gcig tu gnas pa ma yin pas dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba dang ma nges par rtsod pa las so // de bzhin du khyad par med pa mtshungs pa dang po la ste /
translated: In the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.üîΩIn the case of the latter two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.

original: gsum pa la ni nges pa dang ldan pa la nges pa nyid kyis dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas bsgrub bya la gnod par rtsod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsum pa la ni nges pa dang ldan pa la nges pa nyid kyis dod zlar gnas pa'i phyir sun 'byin pa'i sgo nas bsgrub bya la gnod par rtsod pa'i phyir /
translated: In the case of the first two, the reason is contradictory because it is common to the similar and dissimilar cases.

original: 'di rnams ni sun 'byin pa kho na rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni sun 'byin pa kho na rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of the latter two,

original: gal te mthong la gnod med na //
analyzed: gal te mthong la gnod med na //
translated: If there is no harm in seeing,

original: zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par rtsod pa la dmigs kyis bsal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par rtsod pa la dmigs kyis bsal ba gsungs so //
translated: This is a refutation of the thesis that there is harm.

original: mthong ba ni chad mas rab tu grub pa'o //üîΩji ltar phur mthong bas gnod pa ci zhig tu yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: mthong ba ni chad mas rab tu grub pa'o // ji ltar phur mthong bas gnod pa ci zhig tu yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Seeing is well established by the evidence.üîΩHow is there harm by seeing? It is said:

original: ji ltar na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: How is it that the thesis is not established?

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon kho na las zhes pa /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon kho na las zhes pa /
translated: The fault of the thesis itself is said.

original: gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pas grub pa'i sgra'i rang gi mtshan nyid med ces dam 'cha' na /
analyzed: gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pas grub pa'i sgra'i rang gi mtshan nyid med ces dam 'cha' na /
translated: If one asserts that the sound-particular that is established by the auditory consciousness does not exist,

original: de'i tshe mngon sum gyis rab tu grub pas gnod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba mi 'grub bo //üîΩci ste ma nyan par bya ba'i sgra'i brjod bya sgra ru mi 'gyur ro zhes pa de lta yang grags pas grub pas so //
analyzed: de'i tshe mngon sum gyis rab tu grub pas gnod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba mi 'grub bo // ci ste ma nyan par bya ba'i sgra'i brjod bya sgra ru mi 'gyur ro zhes pa de lta yang grags pas grub pas so //
translated: then at that time, because it is well established by perception, the thesis is not established because it is harmed.üîΩBut if one says that the meaning of the sound that is to be heard does not become sound, even so, it is established by common knowledge.

original: gang la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said:

original: rdul gnyis pa can ni rdul sngon ma can yin te /
analyzed: rdul gnyis pa can ni rdul sngon ma can yin te /
translated: The one with two particles is the one with the previous particle.

original: rags pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes byas pa la /
analyzed: rags pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes byas pa la /
translated: Because of being gross, like a pot.

original: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'dis rdul snga ma can nyid du sgrub par byed cing /
analyzed: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'dis rdul snga ma can nyid du sgrub par byed cing /
translated: How does this reason prove that it has a prior particle?

original: 'di ltar rags pa'i rdul sngon ma can nyid du yang zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar rags pa'i rdul sngon ma can nyid du yang zhes pa /
translated: In this way, it is also gross, having a prior particle.

original: shin tu rags pa la ltos pas gang rdul yin pa de rags pa'i rdul lo //
analyzed: shin tu rags pa la ltos pas gang rdul yin pa de rags pa'i rdul lo //
translated: Since it depends on being very gross, whatever is a particle is a gross particle.

original: de lta na yang rdul phra rab rnams rags pa nyid du yang 'grub ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang rdul phra rab rnams rags pa nyid du yang 'grub ste /
translated: Even so, the subtle particles are also established as gross.

original: 'dir tshad ma 'ga' zhig gis kyang rdul phra rab rnams rags pa nyid du bsgrub par bya bzhin pa la gnod pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir tshad ma 'ga' zhig gis kyang rdul phra rab rnams rags pa nyid du bsgrub par bya bzhin pa la gnod pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Here, no valid cognition whatsoever refutes the establishment of the subtle particles as gross.

original: de la lan ci yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la lan ci yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the response to that? It is said:

original: gnod byed mod na 'gal pa nyid //
analyzed: gnod byed mod na 'gal pa nyid //
translated: If there is a refutation, there is contradiction.

original: ces pa'o // ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces pa'o // ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: bsgrub bya gnod byed sgrub byed phyir //
analyzed: bsgrub bya gnod byed sgrub byed phyir //
translated: Because the refutation refutes what is to be established.

original: ces pa'o // yang ci ltar rags pa nyid la rags pa'i rdul sngon ma can nyid kyis khyab /
analyzed: ces pa'o // yang ci ltar rags pa nyid la rags pa'i rdul sngon ma can nyid kyis khyab /
translated: Moreover, how is grossness pervaded by having a prior gross particle?

original: ji srid du 'dir 'brel ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji srid du 'dir 'brel ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But as long as there is no connection whatsoever,

original: de las kyang rags pa yang 'gyur zhing rags pa ma yin pa'i rdul sngon ma can yang ngo zhes pas /
analyzed: de las kyang rags pa yang 'gyur zhing rags pa ma yin pa'i rdul sngon ma can yang ngo zhes pas /
translated: then even the coarse would not be coarse, and even the prior subtle particle would not be subtle.

original: ci zhig las 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig las 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na /
translated: What is it that is contradictory?

original: ji ltar @304b 'gal ba de ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar @304b 'gal ba de ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: It is said to be contradictory in the same way that it is described.üîΩThe treatise Attainment of Knowledge says:

original: yan lag can gyi rdzas ni mtshungs pa'i yul sa can no zhes pa'i gzhung las /
analyzed: yan lag can gyi rdzas ni mtshungs pa'i yul sa can no zhes pa'i gzhung las /
translated: The substance of a part is a substance that possesses a similar spatial location.

original: ji srid du nam mkha'i yul phyogs yan lag gi rdzas thob pa de srid kho nar yan lag can gyi rdzas kyang ste /
analyzed: ji srid du nam mkha'i yul phyogs yan lag gi rdzas thob pa de srid kho nar yan lag can gyi rdzas kyang ste /
translated: As long as the spatial location of space is the substance of a part, for that long the substance of a part is also the substance of a whole.

original: de'i phyir rdul gnyis pa can rags pa nyid du 'dod pa pos de rtsom par byed pa'i rdul gnyis pa can yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rdul gnyis pa can rags pa nyid du 'dod pa pos de rtsom par byed pa'i rdul gnyis pa can yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore the proponent of coarse particles does not assert that the second particle is the composer of the coarse.

original: de dang mtshungs pa'i yul phyogs can nyid kyi phyir ram /
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa'i yul phyogs can nyid kyi phyir ram /
translated: Because it possesses a similar spatial location,

original: yul phyogs tha dad pa nyid na rdul phran ni de'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul phyogs tha dad pa nyid na rdul phran ni de'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or if it possesses a different spatial location, the subtle particle would not be a part of it.

original: de'i phyir rdul gnyis pa can rags pa nyid du khas len pa pos gdon mi za bar de'i yan lag kyang khas blang par bya'o zhes pas 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdul gnyis pa can rags pa nyid du khas len pa pos gdon mi za bar de'i yan lag kyang khas blang par bya'o zhes pas 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the one who accepts the gross as having a second particle must certainly accept its parts.

original: dmigs pa mtshungs pa zhes pa mtshon bya ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa mtshungs pa zhes pa mtshon bya ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúhaving a similar observation‚Äù is the object to be illustrated.

original: lhag ma mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: lhag ma mtshan nyid do //
translated: The rest is the definition.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis kyang zhes pa'i kyang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don can te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis kyang zhes pa'i kyang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don can te /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in ‚Äúby another reason also‚Äù has the meaning of restriction.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan kho nas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan kho nas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means ‚Äúby another reason alone.‚Äù

original: gal te glog la sogs pa la gzhan las mi rtag pa nyid 'grub mod /
analyzed: gal te glog la sogs pa la gzhan las mi rtag pa nyid 'grub mod /
translated: If impermanence is established in lightning, etc. as different from it,

original: de las gang gis de mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ba brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid la ci zhig 'ongs she na bshad pa /
analyzed: de las gang gis de mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ba brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid la ci zhig 'ongs she na bshad pa /
translated: what is the point of searching for what is a reason for impermanence in that which arises immediately after it?

original: de ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says: That is not so.

original: rgyu ni byed rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni byed rgyu'o //
translated: Cause means active cause.

original: rgyu'i sgras bsnan pa las /
analyzed: rgyu'i sgras bsnan pa las /
translated: By adding the word ‚Äúcause,‚Äù

original: byed pa can gyi chos shes par byed pa'i rgyu la sgro btags nas /
analyzed: byed pa can gyi chos shes par byed pa'i rgyu la sgro btags nas /
translated: having imputed the cause that makes known the attribute of the agent,

original: gang zhig gang med kyang 'gyur ba de'i de rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang med kyang 'gyur ba de'i de rgyu ma yin te /
translated: That which is not a cause of something, even when it is absent, is not the reason for that.

original: dper na chu me'i bzhin /
analyzed: dper na chu me'i bzhin /
translated: For example, water is not the reason for fire.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes /
translated: Impermanence is not the reason for arising immediately after effort, because it is not a cause.

original: rgyu dang rgyu dang ldan pa'i dngos po'i tha snyad dgag pa'i ched du rgyu dang 'gal ba bshad do //
analyzed: rgyu dang rgyu dang ldan pa'i dngos po'i tha snyad dgag pa'i ched du rgyu dang 'gal ba bshad do //
translated: The reason that is contradictory to the cause is stated for the purpose of refuting the conventional designation of things as having a cause.

original: 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid la gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid la gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: This is not a reason for impermanence,

original: khyab byed ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: khyab byed ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: because it is not a pervader.

original: gang zhig gang gi khyab par byed par mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi khyab par byed par mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: That which is not a pervader of something is not the reason for that,

original: dper na sems pa dang bcas pa'i nyal ba bzhin /
analyzed: dper na sems pa dang bcas pa'i nyal ba bzhin /
translated: for example, having mind is not the reason for lying down.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyab par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyab par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Arising immediately after effort is not the pervader of impermanence.

original: khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan no //
translated: This is a reflection of the non-apprehension of the pervader.

original: bsgrub byar ma nges sgro btags nas //
analyzed: bsgrub byar ma nges sgro btags nas //
translated: Having exaggerated what is not ascertained as the probandum,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: bsgrub bya'i gang ma nges pa 'khrul ba ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i gang ma nges pa 'khrul ba ste /
translated: The object of the probandum is uncertain, i.e., mistaken.

original: der rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi gtan tshigs la sgro btags nas /üîΩgtan tshigs 'khrul @305a * //
analyzed: der rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi gtan tshigs la sgro btags nas / gtan tshigs 'khrul @305a * //
translated: Immediately after the effort for that, having imputed the reason,

original: pa nyid du rtsod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: pa nyid du rtsod pa'i phyir /
translated: the reason is disputed as being mistaken.

original: de'i gzugs brnyan nyid ma nges pa ltar snang ba nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i gzugs brnyan nyid ma nges pa ltar snang ba nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of ‚Äúuncertain‚Äù is that it is like a mere reflection.

original: byed pa can gyi rgyu la ni zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: byed pa can gyi rgyu la ni zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: With respect to ‚Äúthe cause of the agent,‚Äù etc.,

original: byed pa'i chos gzhan yin zhing /
analyzed: byed pa'i chos gzhan yin zhing /
translated: the property of the agent is different,

original: shes par byed pa'i chos gzhan te /
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i chos gzhan te /
translated: and the property of the object of knowledge is different.

original: de'i phyir rgyu'i tha snyad tsam mtshungs pa las byed pa'i chos shes par byed pa la mi 'gyur zhes ston cing /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu'i tha snyad tsam mtshungs pa las byed pa'i chos shes par byed pa la mi 'gyur zhes ston cing /
translated: Therefore, it is shown that from the mere similarity of the convention of cause, the property of the agent is not the object of knowledge.

original: gtan tshigs snga ma du ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ma nges par gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs snga ma du ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ma nges par gsal bar byed do //
translated: The previous reason is clarified as uncertain by such things as smoke.

original: de ltar ni du ba la sogs pa med kyang me la sogs pa rnams 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar ni du ba la sogs pa med kyang me la sogs pa rnams 'gyur mod /
translated: Thus, even though smoke, etc., do not exist, fire, etc., are possible.

original: de ste yang de rnams ni de rnams kyi gtan tshigs rnams so //
analyzed: de ste yang de rnams ni de rnams kyi gtan tshigs rnams so //
translated: Moreover, those are the reasons for those.

original: gnyis pa la yang gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnyis pa la yang gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: In the second, he states the reason why the reason is not established.

original: ma khyab pa nyid kyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma khyab pa nyid kyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Because of non-pervasion‚Äù and so forth.

original: gtan tshigs te brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid //
analyzed: gtan tshigs te brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid //
translated: The reason is that it arises immediately upon the exertion.

original: ma khyab pa nyid kyis gang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la med pa ste /
analyzed: ma khyab pa nyid kyis gang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la med pa ste /
translated: Because of non-pervasion, it is not in one part of the similar class.

original: bsgrub bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya ste /
translated: The probandum is

original: chos can sgra la rnam par rtog par byed de /
analyzed: chos can sgra la rnam par rtog par byed de /
translated: the subject, sound.

original: de'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it appears as if the reason is not established.

original: 'o na bsgrub par bya ba glog la sogs pa la brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid med pa yod pa kho na yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na bsgrub par bya ba glog la sogs pa la brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid med pa yod pa kho na yin nam /
translated: Well, if the probandum, the non-existence of arising immediately upon exertion, exists in lightning and so forth,

original: des na rnam par rtog par byed ces brjod ce na /
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog par byed ces brjod ce na /
translated: then why is it conceptualized?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: sgrar gnas pas thams cad sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgrar gnas pas thams cad sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is not established in sound, it is not established in all.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir sgra'i rjes su son pa'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis glog la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pas so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra'i rjes su son pa'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis glog la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pas so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because the mere fact of being produced immediately after effort, which is the reason, is not established in the case of lightning, etc., which are the subject, and therefore it is not a proof of their impermanence in every respect.

original: yang ci'i phyir ma grub par snang ba yin gyi sun 'byin pa kho na ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir ma grub par snang ba yin gyi sun 'byin pa kho na ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it that it appears to be unestablished, but not a refutation?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: bsgrub par bya ba kho na la med pa'i phyir ma grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba kho na la med pa'i phyir ma grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because it does not exist in the probandum alone, it becomes unestablished.

original: de 'gyur mod kyi de la yang med do zhe na /
analyzed: de 'gyur mod kyi de la yang med do zhe na /
translated: That may be so, but it does not exist there either.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: sgra la gtan tshigs de med pa yang ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sgra la gtan tshigs de med pa yang ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: The reason is not absent in sound either.

original: the tshom zhes bya zhes pa ltag chod kyi ming nges par ston pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom zhes bya zhes pa ltag chod kyi ming nges par ston pa'o //
translated: The term doubt indicates the name of a fallacy.

original: don tha dad pas zhes pa la sogs pa mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: don tha dad pas zhes pa la sogs pa mtshan nyid do //
translated: The definition is by a different meaning, etc.

original: don ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: don ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Meaning is twofold:

original: dam bca' ba'i don dang gtan tshigs kyi don to //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don dang gtan tshigs kyi don to //
translated: the meaning of the thesis and the meaning of the reason.

original: de tha dad ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don las don gzhan nyid de des gtan tshigs la gang the tshom rtsod pa the tshom du rjod par byed pa de the tshom mtshungs pa'i ltag chod do //
analyzed: de tha dad ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don las don gzhan nyid de des gtan tshigs la gang the tshom rtsod pa the tshom du rjod par byed pa de the tshom mtshungs pa'i ltag chod do //
translated: That is different from the meaning of what is to be expressed, and it is different from the meaning of the reason.  Whatever is expressed by that is said to be a doubt.  That is a reductio that is similar to a doubt.

original: gang du dam @305b bcas pa'i don brtags pas sam zhes pa /
analyzed: gang du dam @305b bcas pa'i don brtags pas sam zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú In regard to which the meaning of the thesis is examined‚Äù means

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i dam bca'i don las dam bca' ba'i don gzhan brtags pas so //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i dam bca'i don las dam bca' ba'i don gzhan brtags pas so //
translated: the meaning of the thesis that is to be expressed is examined as being different from the meaning of the thesis.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don brtags pas zhes pa brjod par 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don las gzhan pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don brtags pas so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don brtags pas zhes pa brjod par 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don las gzhan pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don brtags pas so //
translated: ‚Äú In regard to which the meaning of the reason is examined‚Äù means the meaning of the reason that is to be expressed is examined as being different from the meaning of the reason.

original: rtsol ma thag pa ni gsal ba dang skye ba mthong ba'i phyir the tshom za'o zhes pa /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag pa ni gsal ba dang skye ba mthong ba'i phyir the tshom za'o zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú Because the manifestation and the arising are seen immediately after the effort‚Äù means

original: skye ba'i don du dam pa ci'i don brtags nas sun 'byin par byed de /
analyzed: skye ba'i don du dam pa ci'i don brtags nas sun 'byin par byed de /
translated: why is the meaning of the thesis examined for the sake of arising and then refuted?

original: brtsal ma thag tu gsal ba yang mthong ste /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu gsal ba yang mthong ste /
translated: The manifestation is also seen immediately after the effort.

original: dper na rtsa ba'i chu la sogs pa rnams lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rtsa ba'i chu la sogs pa rnams lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the roots, water, and so on.

original: skye ba yang bum pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: skye ba yang bum pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: And arising is of such things as pots.

original: des na ci 'di rtsa ba'i chu la sogs pa ltar gsal bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: des na ci 'di rtsa ba'i chu la sogs pa ltar gsal bar bya ba'am /
translated: Therefore, is it like water, etc. in a root, that is to be clarified,

original: 'on te bum pa la sogs pa bzhin bskyed par bya ba yin zhes ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: 'on te bum pa la sogs pa bzhin bskyed par bya ba yin zhes ma nges pa ste /
translated: or is it like a pot, etc. that is to be generated? It is not certain.

original: de'i phyir mi rigs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi rigs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúit is not reasonable‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar the tshom za ba de'i phyir na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'di las sgra ni skyes par mi rigs so zhes pa ngag gi don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar the tshom za ba de'i phyir na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'di las sgra ni skyes par mi rigs so zhes pa ngag gi don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that because there is such doubt, sound is not reasonable to arise from this reason, ‚Äúbecause it occurs immediately upon the effort.‚Äù

original: bsgrub byar sgro btags na ma nges /
analyzed: bsgrub byar sgro btags na ma nges /
translated: If it is imputed as the probandum, it is uncertain.

original: ltar snang zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid bskyed par bya bar sgro btags na ni ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ltar snang zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid bskyed par bya bar sgro btags na ni ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúseeming‚Äù is that if impermanence, which is the probandum, is imputed as that which is to be generated, it is uncertain.

original: de la yang zhes pa bskyed par bya ba la'o //
analyzed: de la yang zhes pa bskyed par bya ba la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù in ‚Äúin that‚Äù refers to that which is to be generated.

original: ci'i phyir the tshom za zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir the tshom za zhe na /
translated: Why is there doubt?

original: bshad pa / de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is explained: ‚ÄúIn that way‚Äù and so on.

original: ci'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it that it appears to be uncertain? It is said:

original: 'jig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa dang / gsal bar bya ba rnams la yang 'jig pa nyid yod do zhes pa /
analyzed: 'jig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa dang / gsal bar bya ba rnams la yang 'jig pa nyid yod do zhes pa /
translated: Because of the establishment of destruction itself, and because those that are manifested also have destruction.

original: 'jig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la rtsa ba chu la sogs pa rnams kyis ma nges pa nyid med do zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'jig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la rtsa ba chu la sogs pa rnams kyis ma nges pa nyid med do zhes ston to //
translated: This shows that in the establishment of destruction itself, the roots, water, and so on are not uncertain.

original: sgro btags na 'jug go zhes pa /
analyzed: sgro btags na 'jug go zhes pa /
translated: If one superimposes, one engages.

original: bsgrub bya sgro btags nas zhes pa 'dir bshad pa'i sgro btags pa smos pa 'dir yang rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgro btags nas zhes pa 'dir bshad pa'i sgro btags pa smos pa 'dir yang rjes su 'jug go //
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúsuperimposing the probandum‚Äù here also applies here.

original: gal te gtan tshigs sgro btags nas //
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs sgro btags nas //
translated: If one superimposes the reason,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: and so on.

original: brtsal ma thag tu nye bar dmigs pa pa'i mtshan nyid can gtan tshigs su brjod pa la /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu nye bar dmigs pa pa'i mtshan nyid can gtan tshigs su brjod pa la /
translated: In the statement of the reason, which has the characteristic of being observed immediately upon the application of effort,

original: gal te brtsal ma thag tu skye bar sgro btags nas sun 'byin par byed de //
analyzed: gal te brtsal ma thag tu skye bar sgro btags nas sun 'byin par byed de //
translated: if one refutes by superimposing that it arises immediately upon the application of effort,

original: brtsal ma thag pa can nyid kyi phyir zhes pas ci brjod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag pa can nyid kyi phyir zhes pas ci brjod par 'gyur na /
translated: what would be the point of saying ‚Äúbecause of having the nature of being immediately upon the application of effort‚Äù?

original: brtsal ma thag tu skye ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu skye ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
translated: because it arises immediately upon the exertion.

original: @306a * // skye ba de yang de la ma grub po zhes pa /
analyzed: @306a * // skye ba de yang de la ma grub po zhes pa /
translated: And that arising is not established for him.

original: de'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is a fallacious reason, because it is not established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why? It is said:

original: brtsal ma thag nye bar dmigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩmi mthun phyogs la don gyis ni //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag nye bar dmigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o // mi mthun phyogs la don gyis ni //
translated: because it is observed immediately upon exertion.üîΩThe definition of the second, the contradictory, is:

original: mi 'dod brjod pa zhes pa mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'dod brjod pa zhes pa mtshan nyid do //
translated: that which expresses the opposite of the probandum.

original: lhag ma mtshon bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma mtshon bya'o //
translated: The remainder are the examples.

original: snga ma bzhin du sgrub byed byas pa la smras pa /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sgrub byed byas pa la smras pa /
translated: As before, the proof is stated.

original: 'di skad smra ba'i khyod kyi don gyis brtsal ma thag byung ba ni rtag pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di skad smra ba'i khyod kyi don gyis brtsal ma thag byung ba ni rtag pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: You who speak thus, by implication, say that what arises immediately upon exertion is permanent.

original: de las kyang glog la sogs pa rnams kyis ma nges pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: de las kyang glog la sogs pa rnams kyis ma nges pa'o zhes so //
translated: And that is inconclusive by such things as lightning.

original: gzhan bsgrub bya nyid la 'khrul pa zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gzhan rtag pa nyid de de rtsol ma thag pa can ma yin pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan bsgrub bya nyid la 'khrul pa zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gzhan rtag pa nyid de de rtsol ma thag pa can ma yin pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: The third, the fallacious with respect to the probandum, is that which proves the opposite of the probandum. For example, permanence, which is the opposite of impermanence, is to be proven by the fact that it is not something that arises immediately upon exertion.

original: gtan tshigs 'khrul pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'khrul pa ste /
translated: The reason is mistaken.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la brtsal ma thag can gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la brtsal ma thag can gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the one who is just beginning to investigate impermanence.

original: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is like an uncertain reason.

original: ci'i phyir zha na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zha na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it so? He says:

original: gtan tshigs rtag pa la yang yod pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rtag pa la yang yod pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
translated: The reason is not present in the permanent.

original: yang na zhes pa rnam pa gzhan ston pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes pa rnam pa gzhan ston pa'o //
translated: Or, the word ‚Äúor‚Äù indicates another way of looking at it.

original: 'dir ni sgro btags pa'i nges pa'i 'khrul pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs la sgro btags nas rtsod pa las ma nges pa ltar snang bar 'gyur ro zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni sgro btags pa'i nges pa'i 'khrul pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs la sgro btags nas rtsod pa las ma nges pa ltar snang bar 'gyur ro zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, whatever is a mistaken ascertainment of superimposition, that is an uncertain reason when it is a superimposition on the reason.

original: thal 'gyur mtshungs pa zhes pa mtshon bya dag lhag ma mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: thal 'gyur mtshungs pa zhes pa mtshon bya dag lhag ma mtshan nyid do //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúsimilar to a consequence‚Äù indicates the remaining characteristics of the object of indication.

original: rab tu grub pa'i dpe la yang /
analyzed: rab tu grub pa'i dpe la yang /
translated: In a well-established example,

original: gnyis dag ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag go //
analyzed: gnyis dag ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag go //
translated: the two are the proponent and the opponent.

original: gang gis gtan tshigs tshol bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis gtan tshigs tshol bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is that by which one seeks the reason.

original: bum pa kho na re zhig mi rtag pa'o zhes pa 'di la gtan tshigs ci zhig ces pa 'di ni thal 'gyur mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa kho na re zhig mi rtag pa'o zhes pa 'di la gtan tshigs ci zhig ces pa 'di ni thal 'gyur mtshungs pa'o //
translated: What is the reason for this statement, The pot itself is impermanent? This is a similar reductio.

original: dpe ltar snang pa bzhin 'di yin //
analyzed: dpe ltar snang pa bzhin 'di yin //
translated: This is like a pseudo-example.

original: zhes pa / bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa nyid du grub pa'i bum pa la yang bsgrub bya dang bral ba nyid du rtsod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa / bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa nyid du grub pa'i bum pa la yang bsgrub bya dang bral ba nyid du rtsod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because, even in regard to a pot that is established as possessing the property to be proven, one argues that it is devoid of the property to be proven.

original: yang 'bras bu mtshungs pa las 'di'i khyad par ci zhig ste /
analyzed: yang 'bras bu mtshungs pa las 'di'i khyad par ci zhig ste /
translated: What is the difference between this and the similarity of effect?

original: ji tsam du der yang sgra'i 'bras bu nyid bum pa la med do zhes rtsod pa'i phyir dpe'i skyon ltar snang par brjod pa kho na'o zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji tsam du der yang sgra'i 'bras bu nyid bum pa la med do zhes rtsod pa'i phyir dpe'i skyon ltar snang par brjod pa kho na'o zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: To the extent that one argues that the effect of sound itself does not exist in the pot, it is said to be a fault of the example, a pseudo-example.üîΩTo this, the reply is as follows.

original: snga ma ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The former...

original: der ni sgra'i 'bras bu nyid bum pa la med do zhes gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pas dpe'i skyon ltar snang ba nyid du bshad cing /
analyzed: der ni sgra'i 'bras bu nyid bum pa la med do zhes gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pas dpe'i skyon ltar snang ba nyid du bshad cing /
translated: There, the effect of sound itself does not exist in the pot. Since the reason is not included in the similar class, it is explained to be a pseudo-example due to a fault of the reason.

original: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba rjes su 'gro ba med pas /
analyzed: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba rjes su 'gro ba med pas /
translated: Here, however, the probandum is not pervaded by the probans.

original: de ltar snang ba nyid du'o zhes @306b pa khyad par ro //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba nyid du'o zhes @306b pa khyad par ro //
translated: Therefore, it is only an appearance of pervasion.

original: 'di ni phyogs tsam zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: 'di ni phyogs tsam zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: This is just a fraction of the refutations, etc.

original: 'di ni nged kyis ltag chod rnams la phyogs tsam nye bar bstan pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni nged kyis ltag chod rnams la phyogs tsam nye bar bstan pa ste /
translated: This is just a fraction of the refutations that we have presented.

original: gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the reasons are incomplete, etc., they are only apparent.

original: de rnams ni mtshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid kyis na lan ltar snang ba nyid du shes pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni mtshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid kyis na lan ltar snang ba nyid du shes pa'i don du'o //
translated: Since they are only apparent, they are only apparent replies.

original: phyogs 'dis gzhan rnams la yang mi rigs pa'i lan nyid du rig par bya'o //üîΩma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid kyis zhes pa /
analyzed: phyogs 'dis gzhan rnams la yang mi rigs pa'i lan nyid du rig par bya'o // ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid kyis zhes pa /
translated: By this method, one should understand the other replies to be illogical.üîΩThe reasons are incomplete, etc., are only apparent.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ma grub pa nyid la sogs pa rnams gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ma grub pa nyid la sogs pa rnams gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the reasons that are unestablished, etc.

original: 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams la zhes pa 'dir yang sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags bya dang / bsgrags bya ma yin pa dang / 'thad pa dang zla bo'i dpe dang skabs mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams la zhes pa 'dir yang sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags bya dang / bsgrags bya ma yin pa dang / 'thad pa dang zla bo'i dpe dang skabs mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The words and so on in similar increase and decrease, and so on should be pronounced, and the examples of the proper and improper, the correct and the opponent, the similar and the dissimilar, and so on should be pronounced.

original: yang ci ltar phyogs tsam gyis gzhan la yang mi rigs pa'i don nyid du shes par nus she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar phyogs tsam gyis gzhan la yang mi rigs pa'i don nyid du shes par nus she na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, how can one understand the meaning of improper just from a part of the reason? It is said:

original: 'di rnams kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: These alone, and so on.

original: tsam smos pas ni sbyor ba'i khyad par kho na las rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa skye'o /
analyzed: tsam smos pas ni sbyor ba'i khyad par kho na las rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa skye'o /
translated: By mentioning just a part, an infinite number of distinctions arise only from the particular application.

original: don gyi khyad par las ni ma yin no zhes sto na to //
analyzed: don gyi khyad par las ni ma yin no zhes sto na to //
translated: It is not from the distinction of meaning.

original: de nyid kyi phyir don tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir na de rnams la ji skad brjod pa'i phyogs kyis ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid kyis na mi rigs pa'i lan nyid du shes par nus so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir don tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir na de rnams la ji skad brjod pa'i phyogs kyis ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid kyis na mi rigs pa'i lan nyid du shes par nus so //
translated: For that very reason, because the meaning is not different, one can understand that those [arguments] are improper answers, appearing as if incomplete and so on, by the stated reason.

original: de la 'phel ba mtshungs pa ni sbyor ba snga ma bzhin byas pa la ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa /
analyzed: de la 'phel ba mtshungs pa ni sbyor ba snga ma bzhin byas pa la ltag chod smra ba pos smras pa /
translated: Similarity of increase is when the proponent of a reductio says to the one who has engaged in the above analysis:

original: gal te brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid du chos mthun pa las ji ltar bum pa mi rtag pa de ltar sgra yang 'dod na bum pa dang 'dra ba kho nar sgra yang lus can du 'thob bo zhes pa'o ;
analyzed: gal te brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid du chos mthun pa las ji ltar bum pa mi rtag pa de ltar sgra yang 'dod na bum pa dang 'dra ba kho nar sgra yang lus can du 'thob bo zhes pa'o ;
translated: If you accept that sound is impermanent in the same way that a pot is impermanent, that is, by virtue of its arising as soon as its cause occurs, then it follows, absurdly, that just as a pot is corporeal, so sound must also be corporeal.

original: /'di ni bsgrub par bya ba la dpe'i chos 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir 'phel ba mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: /'di ni bsgrub par bya ba la dpe'i chos 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir 'phel ba mtshungs pa'o //
translated: This is similarity of increase because the property of the example is increased in the conclusion.

original: yang na bum pa mnyan bya ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na bum pa mnyan bya ma yin te /
translated: Or, the proponent of the reductio could say: A pot is not audible,üîΩand therefore it follows, absurdly, that sound also cannot be audible.

original: de'i phyir sgra yang mnyan bya yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ni bsgrub bya la chos gzhan 'grib par byed pa'i phyir 'grib pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra yang mnyan bya yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ni bsgrub bya la chos gzhan 'grib par byed pa'i phyir 'grib pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: This is similarity of decrease because another property of the conclusion is decreased.

original: bsgrags par 'os pa ni bsgrags bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrags par 'os pa ni bsgrags bya ste /
translated: That which is fit to be proclaimed is to be proven.

original: bsgrub bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the conclusion.

original: ji ltar sgra bsgrags bya yin pa de ltar bum pa yang ngo zhes pa bsgrags bya mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sgra bsgrags bya yin pa de ltar bum pa yang ngo zhes pa bsgrags bya mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Just as sound is what is proclaimed, so too is a pot.

original: yang na bum pa bsgrags bya ma yin pa de ltar yang ngo zhes pa bsgrags bya ma yin pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bum pa bsgrags bya ma yin pa de ltar yang ngo zhes pa bsgrags bya ma yin pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Or, just as a pot is not what is proclaimed, so too is sound.

original: bzhi po 'di rnams kyang khyad par @307a * //
analyzed: bzhi po 'di rnams kyang khyad par @307a * //
translated: These four are included in the two:

original: med pa mtshungs pa dang / rnam rtog mtshungs par nang du 'du'o //
analyzed: med pa mtshungs pa dang / rnam rtog mtshungs par nang du 'du'o //
translated: similarity of no difference and similarity of conception.

original: gal te mi rtag pa'i 'thad pa rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid las sgra mi rtag pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa'i 'thad pa rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid las sgra mi rtag pa yin na /
translated: If impermanence is established for sound through the reason of being a product,

original: rtag pa'i 'thad pa lus can ma yin pa nyid las rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'thad pa mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: rtag pa'i 'thad pa lus can ma yin pa nyid las rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'thad pa mtshungs pa ste /
translated: permanence would be established for sound through the reason of being nonphysical.

original: 'di yang rtag par chos mthun pa nyid dam /
analyzed: 'di yang rtag par chos mthun pa nyid dam /
translated: This is similarity of reason.

original: mi rtag par chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis ma nges par dgra zlar gnas par byed pa'i phyir chos mthun pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa dag gi nang du 'du'o //
analyzed: mi rtag par chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis ma nges par dgra zlar gnas par byed pa'i phyir chos mthun pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa dag gi nang du 'du'o //
translated: This is also included in the two: similarity of positive phenomenon and similarity of negative phenomenon because it is inconclusive, remaining as an opponent to either a positive phenomenon or a negative phenomenon.

original: dpe'i zla bo mtshungs pa ni gal te mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la bum pa la sogs pa'i dpe yod do zhes pas sgra mi rtag pa yin na /
analyzed: dpe'i zla bo mtshungs pa ni gal te mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la bum pa la sogs pa'i dpe yod do zhes pas sgra mi rtag pa yin na /
translated: The example that is similar is as follows: If sound is impermanent,

original: rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la yang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dpe yod do zhes pas lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la yang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dpe yod do zhes pas lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: then space and so on would be permanent because, just like space and so on, they are not physical objects, since there is an example such as a pot that exists for the proposition to be proven, namely, impermanence.

original: 'di ni chos mi mthun pa mtshungs pa'i nang du 'du ste /
analyzed: 'di ni chos mi mthun pa mtshungs pa'i nang du 'du ste /
translated: This is included in the similar example that is dissimilar.

original: gal te bum pa'i chos mi mthun pa nyid du dod zlar gnas par byed na'o //
analyzed: gal te bum pa'i chos mi mthun pa nyid du dod zlar gnas par byed na'o //
translated: If one posits space and so on as the example that is dissimilar to the property of the pot,

original: ci ste nam mkha'i chos mthun pa nyid du yin na de'i tshe chos mthun pa nyid mtshungs par ro //
analyzed: ci ste nam mkha'i chos mthun pa nyid du yin na de'i tshe chos mthun pa nyid mtshungs par ro //
translated: then if one posits space and so on as the example that is similar to the property of the pot, then it is similar to the similar example.

original: skabs mtshungs pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: skabs mtshungs pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The similar occasion is as follows:

original: snga ma bzhin byas pa la /üîΩrtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid 'di yod pa la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin byas pa la / rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid 'di yod pa la /
translated: Having done as before,

original: skabs 'di brtsams na /
analyzed: skabs 'di brtsams na /
translated: if one composes this occasion when the mere arising of effort exists,

original: cis na rtag pa mi rtag pa yin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: cis na rtag pa mi rtag pa yin zhes pa ste /
translated: then why is the permanent impermanent?

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ni gsal bya dang bskyed bya dag gis rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ni gsal bya dang bskyed bya dag gis rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the produced and the manifest are seen to be both permanent and impermanent, as soon as effort is made.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs skabs las mi 'da'o zhes pa 'di yang cung zad tsam gyi khyad par tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs skabs las mi 'da'o zhes pa 'di yang cung zad tsam gyi khyad par tha dad pa ste /
translated: Therefore, this statement, ‚Äúthe reason does not go beyond the scope,‚Äù is a slight distinction.

original: the tshom mtshungs par nad du 'du'o //
analyzed: the tshom mtshungs par nad du 'du'o //
translated: Doubt is included in the same way.

original: de ltar gzhan la yang nang du 'dus pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan la yang nang du 'dus pa shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that the others are included in the same way.

original: 'o na ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa rnams brjod par bya ba'i chos ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa rnams brjod par bya ba'i chos ma yin nam /
translated: But are incompleteness and so on not topics to be expressed?

original: de ci ltar ltag chod kyi lan ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang bar bshad ce na /
analyzed: de ci ltar ltag chod kyi lan ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa ltar snang bar bshad ce na /
translated: How is it that they are explained as appearing to be incomplete replies, like a reductio?

original: gsungs pa / 'dir gang kho bo cag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'dir gang kho bo cag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúHere, whatever we say‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: gzhan du na zhes pa gal te nye bar btags pa ma byas par brjod na zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes pa gal te nye bar btags pa ma byas par brjod na zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means if it is expressed without being applied to the opponent.

original: gal te 'di ltar brjod na skyon ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar brjod na skyon ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is said in this way, what fault arises? It is said:

original: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven so‚Äù and so on.

original: thams cad nye bar sdud pa rnams la mtshungs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: thams cad nye bar sdud pa rnams la mtshungs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because the same consequence applies to all the reductios.

original: ji ltar kho nar 'di khyod kyi sgrub byed @307b yin pa de ltar nga'i yang 'di lan no zhes pa 'di ltar snga ma dang phyi ma'i phyogs thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid du 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar kho nar 'di khyod kyi sgrub byed @307b yin pa de ltar nga'i yang 'di lan no zhes pa 'di ltar snga ma dang phyi ma'i phyogs thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid du 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as this is your proof, so this is my reply. Thus, it is the same for all the former and latter positions.

original: phyin ci log dang mi bden nyid //
analyzed: phyin ci log dang mi bden nyid //
translated: ‚ÄúErroneous, untrue, etc.‚Äù

original: ces pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩdang gi sgra ni bsdu ba la'o //
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa ste / dang gi sgra ni bsdu ba la'o //
translated: And so on.üîΩThe word ‚Äúand‚Äù includes.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par 'dzin pa la ste /
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par 'dzin pa la ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúeven‚Äù is for emphasis.

original: 'di la khyad par mtshon pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di la khyad par mtshon pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: There is no difference in the way this is presented.

original: yang na skyon gsum kho na'o zhes rim pa gzhan du sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na skyon gsum kho na'o zhes rim pa gzhan du sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should understand that the three faults are applied in a different order.

original: de la phyin ci log ni snga ma'i phyogs la rab tu sbyar ba'i gtan tshigs mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de la phyin ci log ni snga ma'i phyogs la rab tu sbyar ba'i gtan tshigs mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: Among them, ‚Äúerroneous‚Äù means that the reason applied to the former position lacks the property of the inferential predicate.

original: mi bden pa ni brdzun pa ste /
analyzed: mi bden pa ni brdzun pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúUntrue‚Äù means false.

original: gang gi don ji ltar dam bcas pa de ltar ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi don ji ltar dam bcas pa de ltar ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that the meaning is as it is promised.

original: 'gal ba ni gang gi don ltan cig mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba ni gang gi don ltan cig mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Contradiction is that the meaning is not present at the same time.

original: de la re zhig phyin ci log ces pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: de la re zhig phyin ci log ces pa la sogs pa /
translated: Among those, first, ‚Äúerroneous‚Äù and so on.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni de'i rnam pa can gzhan yang gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni de'i rnam pa can gzhan yang gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes other aspects.

original: de la gzhi rnams zhes pa chos mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de la gzhi rnams zhes pa chos mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Among those, ‚Äúthe bases‚Äù are the similar, the same, and so on.

original: ma nges pa chos mthun pa nyid la sogs pas zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa dag gi lus can ma yin pa nyid kyis dang / rnam par rtog pa dang khyad par med pa mtshungs pa dag gi tshos bya ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: ma nges pa chos mthun pa nyid la sogs pas zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid mtshungs pa dag gi lus can ma yin pa nyid kyis dang / rnam par rtog pa dang khyad par med pa mtshungs pa dag gi tshos bya ma yin pa dang /
translated: ‚Äú Indeterminate‚Äù is by means of the same attributes and so on. The same attributes and the same dissimilarity are by means of the bodylessness and by means of the non-entityness of the discriminations and the distinctions.

original: mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid la sogs pas so //
analyzed: mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid la sogs pas so //
translated: It is by means of the non-apprehensibility by the eye and so on.

original: nges pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pas tha mi dad pa ston to //
analyzed: nges pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pas tha mi dad pa ston to //
translated: ‚Äú Determination‚Äù and so on teaches non-difference.

original: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú Because of not abiding together‚Äù means

original: nges pa dang ma nges pa dag lhan cig gnas pa yod pa ni ma yin pas te /
analyzed: nges pa dang ma nges pa dag lhan cig gnas pa yod pa ni ma yin pas te /
translated: Since it is not the case that the definite and indefinite exist together,

original: de ltar ni nges pa yod na ma nges pa ldog go //
analyzed: de ltar ni nges pa yod na ma nges pa ldog go //
translated: if there is definiteness, the indefinite is excluded.

original: rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa la ni 'di mi rigs te zhes pa /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa la ni 'di mi rigs te zhes pa /
translated: This is not reasonable in the case of similar conceptualization.

original: rtsod pa sgrub par ni tshos par bya ba nyid ma nges pa nyid du bstan pa'i ched du bshad de /
analyzed: rtsod pa sgrub par ni tshos par bya ba nyid ma nges pa nyid du bstan pa'i ched du bshad de /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the probandum itself is indefinite, it is explained.

original: mi rtag pa nyid med par brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mthong ba med de /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid med par brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mthong ba med de /
translated: Without impermanence, the arising of the effect immediately after the cause is not seen,

original: me dang du ba bzhin no //
analyzed: me dang du ba bzhin no //
translated: like fire and smoke.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i ched du de bshad do //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i ched du de bshad do //
translated: It is explained for the sake of inference.

original: tshos bya nyid la sogs pa med par rlung g-yab kyi rlung la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa nyid mthong ba med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: tshos bya nyid la sogs pa med par rlung g-yab kyi rlung la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa nyid mthong ba med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that without the probandum, etc., impermanence is not seen in fans, etc.

original: de'i phyir 'di phyin ci log go zhes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di phyin ci log go zhes so //
translated: Therefore, this is a mistake.

original: de 'di mi rigs so //
analyzed: de 'di mi rigs so //
translated: This is not reasonable.

original: ci ltar mi rigs she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar mi rigs she na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it unreasonable? It is said:

original: pha rol pos ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: pha rol pos ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: The opponent, etc.

original: tshos bya nyid la sogs pas bum pa la mi rtag pa nyid du brjod pa ma yin zhas sbrel lo //
analyzed: tshos bya nyid la sogs pas bum pa la mi rtag pa nyid du brjod pa ma yin zhas sbrel lo //
translated: The words ‚Äúbecause it is not said‚Äù are connected to the statement ‚Äúbecause it is not said that a pot is impermanent by virtue of being a product, etc.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir brjod pa ma yin zhe na /üîΩbum pa la mi rtag pa nyid gnyis ka @308a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir brjod pa ma yin zhe na / bum pa la mi rtag pa nyid gnyis ka @308a * //
translated: Why is it not said?

original: la grub zin ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: la grub zin ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because both the pot and impermanence are already established.

original: de la zhes pa tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that case‚Äù means in the proof of permanence, such as not being a product, etc.

original: de ltar gzhan gyi phyogs la ma nges pa nyid du bshad par 'gyur ro zhes pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang tshos bya ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro//üîΩsnga ma la ni ma khyab pa nyid ces pa /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gyi phyogs la ma nges pa nyid du bshad par 'gyur ro zhes pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang tshos bya ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro// snga ma la ni ma khyab pa nyid ces pa /
translated: Thus, it is explained that there is no certainty regarding the opponent‚Äôs position, because even in the case of a dissimilar instance, such as a pot, not being a product, etc., are seen.

original: re zhig pha rol pos tshos bya nyid la sogs pas mi rtag pa nyid du brjod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: re zhig pha rol pos tshos bya nyid la sogs pas mi rtag pa nyid du brjod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: ‚Äú In the former case, there is no pervasion‚Äù means that the opponent does not say that a pot is impermanent by virtue of being a product, etc.

original: de ltar brjod pa yod na yang ma nges pa nyid du 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa yod na yang ma nges pa nyid du 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Even if such a statement were made, it would not be taught that there is no certainty.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya la ma khyab pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya la ma khyab pa nyid du'o //
translated: The reason is not included in the proposition.

original: ma khyab pa go bar byed pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ma khyab pa go bar byed pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the reason inconclusive,

original: ji ltar brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid la bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid la bzhin no //
translated: just as in the case of impermanence, which is produced by effort.

original: pha rol pos shes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩrtsod pa sgrub par bshad pa mnyan par bya ba nyid kyang sgra dang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi 'ang yod pa la mthong ste /
analyzed: pha rol pos shes pa la sogs pa ste / rtsod pa sgrub par bshad pa mnyan par bya ba nyid kyang sgra dang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi 'ang yod pa la mthong ste /
translated: The opponent says that sound is not to be heard, because it is a product, like consciousness, etc.üîΩBut we see that sound is to be heard, even though it is a product and produced by effort.

original: de las thal bar 'gyur yang 'di las mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid rjes su dpag pa ni mthong ba'i nus pa las ldog go //
analyzed: de las thal bar 'gyur yang 'di las mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid rjes su dpag pa ni mthong ba'i nus pa las ldog go //
translated: And we see that the inference that sound is not to be heard, because it is a product, is contradicted by the power of perception.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi'ang yod pa 'di rtag pa nyid du mthong zhing /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi'ang yod pa 'di rtag pa nyid du mthong zhing /
translated: We see that sound, which is produced by effort, is permanent,

original: gang nus pa las mi rtag pa nyid rjes su dpag pa ldog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang nus pa las mi rtag pa nyid rjes su dpag pa ldog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: and the inference that it is impermanent, because it is a product, is not contradicted by the power of perception.

original: de'i phyir 'di phyin ci log kho na'o zhes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di phyin ci log kho na'o zhes so //
translated: Therefore, this is simply a mistake.

original: 'di yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di yang mi rigs te /
translated: This is also not correct.

original: gang gi phyir pha rol pos sgra la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid rjes su dpag par byas ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir pha rol pos sgra la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid rjes su dpag par byas ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Because the opponent does not infer that sound is not audible because it arises only after effort.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because it is audible.üîΩEven if it exists, sound alone would be permanent, because it arises only after effort.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid yod na yang sgra kho na rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pas lan phyogs snga ma dang 'brel pa ma yin te //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid yod na yang sgra kho na rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pas lan phyogs snga ma dang 'brel pa ma yin te //
translated: This is not the opponent‚Äôs reply.

original: 'di bden par zhes pa rtsol ba sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di bden par zhes pa rtsol ba sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf this is true‚Äù establishes the effort.

original: 'dir ma nges pa nyid rnam pa gnyis su rtsod do //üîΩchos mthun pas ni mi mthun phyogs la yang gtan tshigs yod pa nyid du rab tu bstan pa las sam /
analyzed: 'dir ma nges pa nyid rnam pa gnyis su rtsod do // chos mthun pas ni mi mthun phyogs la yang gtan tshigs yod pa nyid du rab tu bstan pa las sam /
translated: Here, the two types of uncertainty are disputed.üîΩBy similarity, it is shown that the reason exists even in the discordant class.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi bsgrub bya ldog pa na gtan tshigs ldog pa med par bstan pa las so //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi bsgrub bya ldog pa na gtan tshigs ldog pa med par bstan pa las so //
translated: Or, by dissimilarity, it is shown that when the probandum is reversed, the reason does not reverse.

original: de la gal te nged kyis tshos bya nyid ni chos mthun pa nyid kyis ma nges pa nyid du brjod na de'i tshe 'di bden mod /
analyzed: de la gal te nged kyis tshos bya nyid ni chos mthun pa nyid kyis ma nges pa nyid du brjod na de'i tshe 'di bden mod /
translated: If we say that the object to be dyed is not ascertained by the reason of the same nature, then this is true.

original: tshos bya nyid la sogs pa med par mi mthong ba ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'i lan phyogs snga ma dang 'brel ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshos bya nyid la sogs pa med par mi mthong ba ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'i lan phyogs snga ma dang 'brel ba ma yin no //
translated: But the response ‚ÄúIt is not that one does not see the object to be dyed and so on as nonexistent‚Äù is not related to the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: chos mthun pa nyid kyis @308b brjod pa ni ma yin gyi'o na ci zhe na /üîΩchos mi mthun pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid kyis @308b brjod pa ni ma yin gyi'o na ci zhe na / chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis te /
translated: It is not said to be the same nature, but rather it is a different nature.

original: pha rol pos tshos bya min pa nyid la sogs pas sgra rtag pa nyid du brjod de /
analyzed: pha rol pos tshos bya min pa nyid la sogs pas sgra rtag pa nyid du brjod de /
translated: The opponent says that sound is permanent because it is not an object to be dyed and so on.

original: de la bsgrub bya med pa la gtan tshigs med pa nye bar bstan par bya na /
analyzed: de la bsgrub bya med pa la gtan tshigs med pa nye bar bstan par bya na /
translated: If the reason is shown to be nonexistent when the probandum is nonexistent,

original: tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid bsgrub bya rtag pa nyid med pa la med par yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tshos par bya ba ma yin pa nyid bsgrub bya rtag pa nyid med pa la med par yang ma yin te /
translated: then the reason of not being an object to be dyed would not be nonexistent when the probandum of permanence is nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir ma nges pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma nges pa'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore it is not ascertained.

original: de mi rigs te /
analyzed: de mi rigs te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: de 'di skad du tshos bya nyid la sogs pa med par rlung g-yob kyi rlung la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa nyid ma mthong ba ni ma yin zhes pas tshos bya min pa nyid dang / mi rtag pa nyid dag rlung g-yob kyi rlung la sogs pa rnams la lan cig 'byung ba mthong ba'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba ldog pa na /
analyzed: de 'di skad du tshos bya nyid la sogs pa med par rlung g-yob kyi rlung la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa nyid ma mthong ba ni ma yin zhes pas tshos bya min pa nyid dang / mi rtag pa nyid dag rlung g-yob kyi rlung la sogs pa rnams la lan cig 'byung ba mthong ba'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba ldog pa na /
translated: This is saying that it is not the case that impermanence is not seen in the wind of a fan, etc., without the pot, etc., and so on. Because impermanence and non-pot are seen to occur once in the wind of a fan, etc., the object of affirmation is reversed.

original: gtan tshigs ldog pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ldog pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the reason is not reversed.

original: 'di la slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di la slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
translated: The master [DignƒÅga] said this:

original: 'di yod do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yod do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis exists,‚Äù and so on.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni khyab pa'o //
translated: Concomitance is pervasion.

original: de'i bzlog pa ni chos mthun pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyi rjes su bsgrub par bya bas 'gro ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya med na gtan tshigs med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bzlog pa ni chos mthun pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyi rjes su bsgrub par bya bas 'gro ba dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya med na gtan tshigs med pa'o //
translated: The opposite of that is the reason following the object of affirmation by the method of agreement, and the absence of the reason when the object of affirmation is absent by the method of difference.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam grangs kyis gang gi dpe gnyis po brjod par bya ba de kho na'i so sor sgrub pa 'di rigs na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam grangs kyis gang gi dpe gnyis po brjod par bya ba de kho na'i so sor sgrub pa 'di rigs na /
translated: The two examples that are to be stated by way of the category of concomitance are only to be established individually in that very case.

original: de ltar ni rtsod pa sgrub par ma yin te zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar ni rtsod pa sgrub par ma yin te zhes pa /
translated: But it is not like that, because it is not an establishment of a dispute.

original: der rnam pa 'dis dpe gnyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: der rnam pa 'dis dpe gnyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: In that case, the two examples are not to be stated by this mode.

original: de ltar mtshan nyid ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan nyid ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the definition is not stated.

original: de dag gi'am de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gi 'brel ba ston pa dpe'i zhes pa'i tshig las te /
analyzed: de dag gi'am de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gi 'brel ba ston pa dpe'i zhes pa'i tshig las te /
translated: The indication of the connection of those or of their discordant classes is from the word ‚Äúexample.‚Äù

original: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin yang sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin yang sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is also applied according to the definition.

original: gang bshad pa zhes pa /
analyzed: gang bshad pa zhes pa /
translated: What is explained?

original: der ni 'di bshad de /
analyzed: der ni 'di bshad de /
translated: There it is explained thus:

original: gang chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid dag las /
analyzed: gang chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun pa nyid dag las /
translated: From among the similarities and dissimilarities,

original: rtag pa nyid du rjes su dpog pa la /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du rjes su dpog pa la /
translated: if permanence is inferred,

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid 'ga' zhig rtag pa nyid du dang mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid kyang nges par mi rtag pa nyid du mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid 'ga' zhig rtag pa nyid du dang mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid kyang nges par mi rtag pa nyid du mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not that something that is to be heard is seen to be permanent, and that something that is not to be heard is definitely impermanent.

original: de'i phyir 'di phyin ci log pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di phyin ci log pa'o zhes so //
translated: Therefore, this is erroneous.

original: de mi rigs pa nyid du ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de mi rigs pa nyid du ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: He states that this is unreasonable:

original: de 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHere, that‚Äù and so on.

original: sgra rtag ste mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
